future children's names or the trip to Italy we were saving for once we
finished our time in the country; he doesnâ€™t remember any of it. My heart
breaks every day, how can this be happening. We were so happy, we were working
so hard for the past two years in one of the least popular Police Stations in
the state to further our careers and build the foundation of our life for
something like this to happen just four months away from completing our tenure
and going home to Perth.
 
I am
Ryan's full time carer now. I have taken a year leave without pay from the job
we both love to nurse Ryan back to health. Everything you need to do to take
care of yourself on a daily basis I need to do for Ryan. I cannot accept that
this is now our life. I cannot let Ryan down and I must do anything and
everything humanly possible to get Ryan back to the person I fell in love with.
 
But is
comes at considerable cost. I have found one of the leading hospitals in
rehabilitation in the world, at the Rehabilitation Institute of Chicago (RIC).
This is our last hope at getting Ryan the absolute best recovery possible. I
need to do this for Ryan, for us. I am 24 years old. Ryan is 29. This cannot be
it for the rest of our lives. 
 
For the
level of care Ryan requires the monthly stay at RIC is approximately
$150,000.00
 
We have
funding efforts in place here in Perth but it is on a small scale considering
the amount we need. Not having reached even a monthâ€™s deposit. Realistically
Ryan needs at least 6-12 months to gain a benefit from RIC. I know this is an
astronomic amount to ask for but Ryan's needs this, I need this, I need him
back.  Even if we donâ€™t reach our goal every cent will go into however
many days I can get Ryan at RIC. This money will only be used for Ryan's stay
at RIC, nothing else.
 
Please
help one of our community's finest to get back to the amazing person he is.
Please help us get our life back.*Created by Antonia Misitano thru Ryan Marron's Facebook page*

story:
L’enjeu, l’air que nous respirons

Depuis le début du XXIe siècle, l’Organisation Mondiale de la Santé (OMS) définit la Qualité de l’Air Intérieur (QAI) comme une priorité de santé publique et un droit fondamental.

La Qualité de l’Air Intérieur est polluée par les aspirateurs

L’aspirateur est le plus performant des incubateurs de bactéries !

Quand un aspirateur est démarré, l’air intérieur est immédiatement pollué pour plusieurs heures car le corps de l’appareil est infesté de bactéries et d’acariens.

Les expositions répétées à cet air pollué augmentent la sensibilité aux allergies même pour les personnes qui ne souffrent pas de maladies respiratoires comme l’asthme.

Pour être enfin efficace et pour améliorer la qualité de l’air intérieur il fallait revoir la conception de cet appareil devenu indispensable. Le résultat de notre recherche est simple : débarrasser les bactéries et les acariens de l’intérieur de l’appareil : ils ne peuvent plus se développer, ils ne sont plus dispersés. La pollution est stoppée.

Fig. 1: Ce schéma montre les causes de la dégradation de la qualité de l’air intérieur provoquée par un aspirateur.

 

innovation : « Le laver ! »

Vous faites attention à l’hygiène, vous prenez soin de votre maison, maintenant vous pouvez aussi laver l’aspirateur !

Le Lakproper a été conçu pour que vous accédiez à toutes ses parties. Vous pouvez nettoyer tout l’intérieur en quelques minutes. Vous n’avez même pas besoin d’un tournevis.

Design

Encombrant, sale, flexible en balade… brosses et tubes… Stop ! “Dessinez-le pour qu’il se range enfin !”. C’est la première chose que demandent les utilisateurs.

Carré pour se ranger partout

Carré comme une boîte, l’idée de la simplicité, du rangement sans espace perdu. C’est aussi un symbole puissant. Le Lakproper peut trôner au beau milieu du salon comme un totem dédié à la Qualité de l’Air Intérieur.

Étroit, ça passe partout

À force de travail, le Lakproper a gagné en finesse. Carré et étroit, il peut se loger derrière la porte, il n’encombre pas le placard, il s’attrape au mur de la cuisine d’un seul geste. Il peut se porter à l’épaule pour nettoyer la volée d’escalier sans danger. Quantité d’avantages bien pratiques !

Fig. 3 : Le premier prototype faisait 15 cm de large. En série, il sera encore plus étroit, environ 10 cm !

 

Gammes Lakproper lavables

Pour la maison ou en milieux professionnels, avec les versions à sec ou à eau, vous trouverez le Lakproper qui répondra à vos besoins. Toutes les versions sont lavables en quelques minutes.

Vous pourrez également configurer vos jeux d’accessoires avec les Kits fonctionnels ou, plus surprenant, les Kits Design pour intégrer Lakproper dans votre décoration intérieure.

Gamme d’intérieur

Lakproper ne vendra pas de version sans sac pour usage en intérieur car c’est une solution réellement mauvaise pour la santé. En dessous de 0,03 micron, toutes les particules reprennent leur envol au moment de vider le récipient de l’aspirateur sans sac. L’utilisateur est directement exposé au nuage invisible de particules allergènes qui s’en échappe.

Fig. 4 : En intérieur, le Lakproper fonctionne avec des sacs ou avec de l’eau, c’est plus sain.

 

Gammes professionnelles

Les gammes professionnelles proposent un choix de matériaux spécifiques comme l’acier inoxydable ou l’aluminium, plus léger. Ils s’adaptent à l’agressivité et les contraintes d’environnement.

Les versions sèches s’adaptent bien aux très grandes surfaces. Les versions à eau répondent aux besoins des bureaux où la qualité de l’air intérieur est aussi primordiale qu’au domicile.

Le fondateur

Designer, le meilleur des métiers pour un inventeur qui a la tête sur ses deux épaules… enfin, je l’espère !

Je pense globalité avant de traiter les détails et ne baisse jamais les bras : deux atouts pour mener à bien mon travail.

Mes amis et ma famille m'ont demandé si je n’allais pas m’ennuyer à ne travailler que sur un aspirateur. J’ai répondu « non » parce que le sujet est bien plus vaste, l'objectif étant la qualité de l’air intérieur et peut-être aussi celui de l’extérieur. En fait, je me trouvais face à 30 ans de recherche et développement, de quoi relancer ma motivation en permanence.

Par exemple, à cause du concept “lavable” le Lakproper n’a pas besoin d’outil, du coup il ne faut pas une usine pour le produire. Cela a permis de penser l’industrialisation puis la distribution ou la vente d’une manière complètement différente en relation avec le développement durable. Lakproper créera des emplois locaux et renforcera le commerce de proximité.

Aucune chance de s’ennuyer !

Jacques Philippe, fondateur 

À quoi servent vos investissements ?

Nous avons tous besoin de conseils. Nous souhaitons recueillir votre opinion sur le projet Lakproper. Alors, laissez-nous vos commentaires.

Vos contributions serviront à étendre nos brevets.

Vous savez que les ailes d’un avion de ligne semblent simples alors qu’elles sont complexes, il en est de même pour le Lakproper. Vos contributions serviront également à la définition des détails techniques du prototype de postproduction, dernier stade avant de passer en production.

Mille mercis pour vos participations.

Description des contreparties

Vous récupérerez le montant de votre contribution en intégralité, plus tous les contreparties pour faire fructifier votre participation lors de l’achat de votre premier Lakproper.

Accédez aux détails de vos contreparties ci-dessous.

Afin de vous remercier un peu plus, vous recevrez une carte de réduction de 5 % valable à vie en tant que “crowdfondeur”, et membre fondateur très spécial à nos yeux.

Supporter

Transformer


Conservez gratuitement l’emballage consigné Transformer Tool Box.
Transformez cet emballage conçu sur le mode du développement durable en boîte à outils ou tout ce que vous voulez.

 

Vous pouvez échanger votre contribution avec un membre de votre famille. Indiquez-nous simplement quel cadeau vous souhaitez faire : nous le rendrons encore plus marquant et amusant, gratuitement.

Vous recevrez votre carte de membre après que vous ayez configuré votre compte sur lakproper.com.

Votre carte sera envoyée au moins trois mois avant l’arrivée des Lakproper en magasins.

story:
Hello, world. I’m Kathleen Kennedy and I’m on a mission to give as many affordable massage therapy sessions to as many people as humanly possible. I have been providing sliding scale massage services for eight years now and the issues of access and affordability has always been close to my heart.

In a healthcare system where countless people go without coverage, the philosophies of self-care or preventative care are foreign to many. I want to bridge the gap to health and healing by making massage not only affordable and accessible, but through actively promoting self-care practices.

The Experiment in Giving

My mission is to give 10 distinctly different people free bi-weekly massage therapy sessions for 6 months. These people are teachers, community leaders, single parents, homeless folks and local business owners. They have health issues ranging from seizure disorders to scoliosis. Together, we will document our experiences and testify of the transformative power of massage. Throughout this “Experiment in Giving” I plan to share our stories by way of an online blog, which at the end of the experiment, will be published and distributed as a zine.

My hope is to not only provide free massage and radically impact the health of 10 awesome people but also to inspire more social dialogue around the importance of self-care.

By funding this campaign or simply passing the word along, you can help bring healing to people who normally wouldn’t have access to massage and help me carry out my dream.

To make this mission a reality, I need support; be it moral or financial. Hey, I like online or real-life cheerleaders and I’ll definitely need financial backing in order to do this.

Whether you’re an expectant mother…a hard working bartender…a coach….a boss who wants to give back to your hard working employees….another massage therapist…or anyone willing to purchase and receive a session from me….or give one away…its all here.

I am asking for $10,000 because I did some math. Yep, 25 massage sessions a week (which is the ideal amount of sessions I can and am willing to do per week) at $30 a session (that’s half the price of what a ‘normal’ session costs) multiplied by 6 months equals...well, $18,000! Hence, I am asking for less than the total amount that I would earn if I went the classical route working for myself alone. I am outsourcing to you all here and now because I believe $10,000 for 6 months of dynamic bodywork is a win/win situation for us all! This campaign is my way of putting myself, and my work, out there for the folks in Gainesville and around the globe that want to have affordable dynamic intuitive bodywork in their lives or simply want to help make it possible for others.

The funds raised through this campaign will not only directly impact my ability to serve my community through providing free massages to folks without healthcare, but will also empower me to build my own practice that’s centered on giving and ultimately fulfill my dream of bringing massage to the working-class.

In detail, the money raised through this campaign will help cover rent for my office space, the many bottles of massage lotion produced by local vendors, the excessive amounts of laundry, the gas in my tank for trips to different charity events or peoples homes that can not make the trip to an office space, and most likely a farmers market or 20. I do want to purchase a massage chair. As of now, I am borrowing one so that I can use it at events. And of course, the funds will also be used to feed and house myself because I need the basics in life too. Basically, these contributions will fund my existence and allow me to give and give and give and do what I love.

I see this as a win/win situation. You sign up for a massage and you get a massage….this is not a charity situation. This is an experiment in giving.

So again, the perks are simple and ranging and vast. If you live in town and want to purchase a massage…sign up and let the bodywork begin. If you live in or out of town, purchase a session for a friend…a club…a nonprofit…an office party…a random stranger…you get the idea. Massages will be had. This all being said, I am one person and I can reasonably do 20 massages a week (plus the free sessions for the group of 10) so it’s first come first serve…The campaign is 30 days long but I will begin the massage list as soon as people start signing up. THe 10 person group will officially begin the 3rd week of May. My vision is that, if my goal is met…hint hint…it will take me the next 3-6 months to accomplish all this awesomeness. Of course, I am here and committed and the massages will not stop at 6 months but I want to put that time frame out there so everyone is aware.

This is a deal….the going rate for an hour massage typically starts at $60. I am offering $30 sessions not only to get the ball rolling but also because I have ALWAYS offered sliding scale pricing and want to continue this throughout my practice. From day one and forever onward I want people to have access to the bodywork they need AND can afford. I walk the walk…..This is MY mission and I can truly only speak for myself….but if I believe the present healthcare system is failing--and oh, I do--and I strongly believe in preventive healthcare--and oh, I really do--then how can I justify charging everyone the same? I cannot and I will not. Period.

 

A little bit about me, how I got here, and why I believe in massage.

I endlessly thank my hard working parents for raising me under the rule of thumb: Be giving. Always. Whether it was the homeless shelter my parents helped run against much opposition in downtown Richmond VA or bringing an entire Cambodian family into our home until they could successful be on their own, all of it guided me to find my true self and my inner strength in order to survive a very traumatic childhood illness and emergency surgery. The details are not as important as the outcome: ME. My experience facing a life-threatening situation has instilled in me a great awareness around pain and suffering and has inspired me to find ways in which I can bring healing into the present.

In my experience as a LMT, I have noticed that there seems to be this crazy stigma that massage therapy is a luxury reserved for the rich or those who can selfishly pamper themselves. I could rant about that all day, believe me….but the truth is that massage therapy has been used in healing since, well, forever. Part of this campaign is to encourage a shift in the cultural perceptions around massage and promote the idea that therapeutic touch is vital to the health of the human body, spirit and mind.

The practice of being present in one’s body helps us gradually begin to understand what we need and want. How do you want to bring healing into the present? What assistance do you need from others? This kind of self-awareness has no price tag and the dialogue around self-care it is an integral part of what I am all about.

I am committed to this town and the people in it. I have traveled across the country and back playing music and giving massages along the way. What I’ve learned is that there are so many people ready and willing to be giving in so many ways…you just need to ask. People gave and gave and I not only survived life on the road, but I also thrived in creating a life worth living.

I truly believe in the healing potential of massage therapy.  I want to continue to build my massage therapy practice and reach out to more people who want to bring health and healing into the present….Any and all contributions will be accepted and shared through my work and I am grateful for any and all cheerleaders who want to get on the horn, or the twitter…or the facebook…or this or that to help me launch this experiment. Feel free to send me a message, encouragements, criticisms, questions and I will respond.

Thanks IndieGoGo for existing and for anyone and everyone who has read this entire proclamation. Be well…..and get a massage already!    

Kathleen Kennedy LMT in Florida ma42115

Feel free to send me a message, encouragements, criticisms, questions and I will respond.
Thanks IndieGoGo for existing and for anyone and everyone who has read this entire proclamation. Be well…..and get a massage already!    
Kathleen Kennedy LMT in Florida ma42115

story: Hello everyone! Millersville University is in the process of starting a quidditch team. Our school has made it clear that we will not be able to become an official organization and receive funding through the school. Due to the nature of quidditch(which they claim isn't a real sport), being co-ed and full contact, they told us there is almost no chance that we will be able to secure an adviser. Even if we do find an adviser they will still have the chance to turn us down. As you all know there is a lot of money that goes into starting a team. Most of our players come from low-income families and are joining the team in order to make friends are get away from the challenges that they were facing at home. We are really trying to keep costs down as low as humanly possible in order to allow everyone to play who is interested. Any donations to our team are greatly appreciated!

story:
UPDATE!!

1st round of chemo finished yesterday. No unexpected complications. Doctors are possibly going to push up round 2 by a week. Now, to keep him healthy until round 2.

 

 

Yesterday chest port was installed. Today cycle one of chemo begins for him. 6 days inpatient...

 

 

 

No evidence of disease in lungs. 3 rounds of chemo, 6 weeks of radiation, then 3 more rounds of chemo. Starting within 2 weeks.

On Thursday Terry was able to have his full body PET/CT Scan. These results will be used to see if the disease has spread anywhere, and to decide to absolute best and most appropriate treatment for him. We should know the results and treatment plan on Wednesday, the 8th. Please hope and pray for the best possible results...Thank you.

 

 

Please Help Terry Through His Cancer Diagnosis and Treatment

My son Terry was recently diagnosed with a synovial sarcoma. Synovial sarcoma is an extremely rare and  highly aggressive soft tissue cancer, that has a tendency to spread to the patients lungs.

Terry had the symptoms of this tumor since the age of 14. We went to the doctors on numerous occasions, just to be ignored and told it was pain due to his being thin. Early this year, Terry went to an outside doctor who immediately noticed it was a tumor, and sent him for approriate tests. He had surgery last Wednesday, in which the primary tumor was removed. He just received the catastrophic diagnosis a few days ago, and are working to accept it. At the same time we were told thatsome of the treatment he will need, will not be covered. Including some of the important scans needed in order to properly stage and treat this disease.

Terry has always been a great kid. He did great in school, and he has worked since he was 15. He is an Electrical Engineering student and was hoping to transfer to UOP next Fall. He is engaged and has a 2 year old son, Joshua, who adores him. He has worked really hard to get where he is. Terry and his son live in a house they rent. Terry works fulltime while also going to school fulltime. He is a great father, son, brother and god willing, a husband someday. We have found him great doctors at UCSF. He just cannot afford all of the tests and treatments needed.

Terry has never liked asking anyone for help. He has always been a prideful person, and a hard worker. He has never expected something for nothing.

the doctor informed us that he will not be able to work through his treatment. Even if he is granted disability, he will not be able to afford the basic necessities of life, let alone cancer treatment. He will be having impatient chemotherapy and radiation treatment, once we are able to get all of the body scans needed, in order to see if it has spread. His best case scenario is missing months of work. We live 40 miles from the treatment center, where even parking is $28 a day.

We also want to do everything we can to make sure Terry does not have to drop out of school, as he has worked so hard to get to this point.

What We Need & Hope You Can Help With

Anticipated needs to get him and his family thru treatment:

  • He needs to start with a PET scan which runs around $8000, prior to beginning treatment
  • He will need follow up CT scans every 3-6 months
  • We are hoping to raise enough to help with their rent, utilities and groceries while he is off of work, as well as transportation costs to and from the hospital.
  • Other medical expenses and medications that are not or will not be covered

The Impact This Has Had

This diagnosis has been a huge blow to our entire family. Though no one deserves a cancer diagnosis, we cannot wrap our heads around this happening to Terry. He is a great young man loved by anyone who knows him. He is a terriffic father who has been hands on since his son Joshua's birth. He helps anyone who is in need, any chance he gets. I just want Terry to be able to get the cancer treatment he needs and deserves, in order to give him the best possible chance at a long life!

Other Ways You Can Help

I wanted to clear up some confusion. There is no minimun donation. Every cent counts and helps..

It was suggested to me that I put an alternative way to donate other then through this sight. Especially for larger donations, as they take a portion, as does paypal.

You can contact me via email at aprilephillips@comcast.net . Please be sure to include a return address so that we can thank you appropriately. Checks can simply be made out to Terry Richards.

Others have enquired about transportation needs. He would greatly appreciate gas cards, as the frequent trips to San Francisco are draining him. He has access to Shell, Chevron, and Safeway. Safeway gas is the cheapest in our area.

Please, get the word out. Share this with your co-workers, church, family, friends and social networks.

Please, get the word out. Share this with your co-workers, church, family, friends and social networks.

story: ...

My name is Kirsten, I work full-time and have a 3 year old little girl named Brooklyn who will be 4 in August. I raise my daughter by myself with no support from her father. I was diagnosed with HPV right after finding out I was pregnant with my daughter back in 2007, I keep up with my check-ups every year and this one wasn’t normal, they told me I was high-risk for cervical cancer and I would need a colposcopy to examine the abnormal cells and to get a biopsy. When I got my biopsy results it came back with moderate dysplasia which is pre-cancerous cells on the cervix. I have to have what is called a LEEP procedure to remove the abnormal cells before they turn into cancer. Unfortunately the company that I work for does not offer any kind of health insurance as they are a small business, so I contacted my local government aid office to see if I would qualify for Medicaid and I don’t. Unless I make less than $200 a month or have been diagnosed with CANCER they will not help me. I also reached out to the American Cancer Society and there is nothing they can do to help me either. So do I sit back and wait until this turns into cancer before I can get the medical help that I need? I am all that my baby girl has, and I don’t want her to watch her mother die from cancer or go through the things that someone with cancer goes through.

 

This campaign is to help raise funds for surgery to remove the abnormal pre-cancerous cells from the cervix before they turn into cancer. This is very important to me because I want to take care of the problem before it gets any worse when it could have been prevented.  I have a little girl to raise and I would hate to have to quit my job so that the state will help me with my surgery or wait until I get cancer to get the help that I need which is going to in turn cost the taxpayers more money on something that could have been prevented. Please help so that I can watch my daughter grow up and enjoy all the things that a parent enjoys with their children.

 

If I can raise enough money for this surgery I can get this problem taken care of and not have to worry about things getting any worse than they already are. I will be able to watch my daughter grow and enjoy parenthood. I will be able to continue to work and provide for my daughter the best that I possibly can.

 

The surgery is going to be around $2,500 and this solely goes to the doctor and surgery center for the procedure. Dr. Evan Wood of West Plains Missouri.

The company that I work for Countryside Pet Supply is going to give a $10 gift certificate for every $100 donation.  This gift certificate will be good for www.countrysidepet.com.

story:
Learn more about illumy at SoundOasis.com

illumy is in stock and shipping - get the best deal on Indiegogo: illumy + free cover!

            

Get To Sleep Fast

illumy gets you to sleep faster with gradually dimming sunset-colored lights.

 

Wake Up Energized Every Morning

In the morning, illumy wakes you up with blue-sky light. Blue light increases alertness and pulls you through that sleep inertia that makes getting up so difficult.

 

Eliminate Distracting Thoughts

For stubborn insomniacs, our revolutionary Sleep Enhance® technology guides you into sleep with pulsing lights. These lights pulse at slower Delta frequencies at bedtime and faster Alpha frequencies in the morning. illumy blocks all outside light that can keep you awake or interfere with your natural melatonin ﬂow.

No More Afternoon Energy Dip

Take a power nap with illumy and vanquish the afternoon energy dip. A break in the afternoon increases productivity while a dose of blue light boosts alertness. Combine with a coffee for the ultimate coffee nap.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 


 

Research helped make illumy, and it’s important to us to give back. So far we have provided pre-production illumy masks for sleep and light therapy research and as a tool to study 40 Hz stimulation for Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s studies. We’re excited to expand this program and have committed to donating one illumy to research for each of the first 50 campaign pledges.

Are you an academic or medical researcher? Get in touch with us and let us know how illumy could help your studies! We can provide customized software for your application.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


To design illumy, we sifted through scientific journals and spoke to sleep experts. Our first challenge was fitting the capabilities we wanted into the mask without making it heavy or bulky. Rather than build buttons and a display onto the mask, we decided to take advantage of a user interface almost everyone already has—a smartphone. This allowed us to ensure that the mask was lightweight and comfortable while effectively blocking external light.

The most challenging nuance was getting the lights right. As we dug through sleep research, a clear picture began to emerge. Humans have developed sensory responses to cues that occur every day in nature, but our modern lifestyle often prevents us from receiving those cues. A sunrise is rich in blue light, and studies have indicated that exposure to blue light in the morning is as effective as a cup of coffee. Red light, on the other hand, is calming and prepares you for bed. We designed our mask to provide light that provokes these natural responses, allowing you to fall asleep faster and to wake more gently and quickly.

(NASA uses similar light patterns in the space station to help astronauts regulate their sleep cycles—read more here.)

 

 

 


 

“I've grown dependent on the mask to sleep while traveling as many hotels don't have reliable blackout curtains. Also use at home on nights when I have to wake at a very early hour as it's light out when I go to bed."
- Josh H.
United Airlines Pilot

 

"Really nice looking product and excellent quality. The blue morning light is excellent and it is nice to be able to adjust the wake up time. It is blocking out light 100% from the outside without any problems. The app is very good"
- Michael von der Recke
Denmark


“I'm very impressed! Overall a comfortable mask and it stayed on well all night. The app is very simple and easy to use.”
- Joe W.

 

"Congratulations on illumy, it is an impressive device. It seems very well made and is quite comfortable."
-Justyn B
UK

 


 

At Sound Oasis, we are passionate about helping people to sleep better. Our complete line of products has always focused on helping people fall asleep and stay asleep - naturally. 

illumy, the latest product in our line of sleep masks, expands on this goal by recognizing that waking refreshed and relaxed is just as important as falling asleep easily. Waking up to a blaring alarm clock is not only annoying, you often wake up during the deepest part of your sleep, and that can leave you groggy all morning.

illumy was envisioned by our team to let everyone benefit from this science of light
developed for NASA.

We are very proud of this product and very proud of the team that brings it to you. We encourage you to try illumy for yourself and see what a great night's sleep can be.

 

 

 

Troy Anderson - Co-Founder


Mr. Anderson graduated with a  Bachelor of Commerce degree in marketing from the University of Calgary and an MBA degree in international business from the University of Leuven in Belgium.  Mr. Anderson has served in various product marketing and new business development capacities with Black & Decker Canada (where he met his future business partner, Rudy Vandenbelt), Black & Decker U.S. and The Schawbel Corporation (a Boston based R&D firm). Troy and Rudy have invented and successfully commercialized a multitude of “first in the world” consumer products.

Rudy Vandenbelt – Director of R&D / Co-Founder

Rudy graduated with a Bachelor of Applied Science in Mechanical Engineering from Queen’s University in Kingston, Canada.  He began his product development career at Black and Decker which coincidentally is where he and his current business partner Troy Anderson first met.  Since 1994 the two partners have managed the development, manufacture, and sale to retail clients of over 100 of their own unique and proprietary consumer products and appliances.

Philippe Genereux – Technical lead

Phil holds a Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace Engineering and a Master's in Mechanical Engineering. He started his career as a partner in a medical device startup creating a product from his University research. His affinity for research and new ideas continues as he works on as many aspects of product design and invention as he can possibly manage. This approach has led the team to file patents for medical devices, air cleaners, and sleep technology.

Adam Clarke – Software Developer

Adam holds a Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering. He has 3 years of experience in designing, prototyping, and manufacturing of consumer goods. His love of model building and tinkering since a young age has given him the many skills necessary for product development. Self taught in the areas of software development, he has contributed to the design and function of websites and developed successful apps across multiple platforms.

 

 

     

Everyone knows someone who would love a natural sleep alternative that WORKS. Share our campaign with your friends on social media! 

 

 

 

 

Q: Can you adjust the brightness of the illumy sunset?

A: Yes. In the sunset mode, press and hold the sleep button. The red sunset will dim as you hold the button. Release your finger when you have reached your preferred sunset brightness.

 

Q: Will the head strap fit both large and small heads?

A: Yes, illumy has an adjustable Velcro® strap so it comfortably fits all sizes of heads.

 

Q: How does the Sleep Enhancement work? 

A: If you suffer from insomnia or need extra help waking up, our optional Sleep Enhancement® technology uses pulsing lights to help. At bedtime, the dimming sunset will pulse at increasingly slower Delta frequencies consistent with falling asleep, and in the morning the “blue sky” light will pulse at increasingly faster Alpha frequencies to assist with waking and alertness. You can turn this feature on or off in the illumy app. 

 

Q: Can you only adjust the illumy settings with the illumy app on a smartphone or tablet?

A: No, you can also program your illumy using your computer by visiting this page on the Sound Oasis website: www.glotosleep.com/programmer/. Select your illumy alarm settings, connect your illumy to the computer with the programming cable, and press the sync button.

 

Q: Do I need to use illumy every day?

A: Everyone is unique. Some people use the sunset every night to distract from racing thoughts and their unreasonably long to-do lists. Some people use the sunset on nights when it’s particularly difficult to fall asleep (the same way a lot of people use our nature sound machines).

Others use illumy during particular seasons of the year. December to March can be pretty dreary in the morning, and one of the best ways to overcome this sleep inertia is with illumy's sunrise.

Over time you’ll find the right combination, but we think a lot of people are going to enjoy illumy every day.

 

Q: Where can I download the illumy app?

A: The app can be found here:

                    

 

Q: How long can I expect the battery to last?

A: If you use illumy every night, you can expect about 2 weeks of battery life. This will depend on your settings, of course. Shorter sunset and sunrise settings will extend this time.

 

Q: illumy has a washable cover—what is the best way to wash it?

A: The electronics should not be submerged in water, so the best way to wash the cover would be to follow these simple steps:

1.       Remove the strap.

2.       Open the zipper.

3.       Remove the electronics module.

4.       Place the cover and strap in the washing machine and use a gentle wash cycle.

5.       Allow the cover and strap to air dry.

6.       Reinsert the electronics module into the cover and replace the strap. You’re all set for another great night’s sleep!

The foam can also be washed with a mild detergent and warm water using a soft cloth.

 

Q: When will I receive illumy?

A: We are working to have stock available by April. The earliest backers will receive illumy even sooner, as stock comes off the production line. We’ll do our best to deliver to all of our backers by April 2017. We’ll keep you updated as the campaign progresses and after the campaign, so you’ll always have a good idea of what to expect.

 

Q: How do you determine your shipping prices?

A: We use actual shipping prices that we were quoted by various couriers. We chose the best value for each location so your shipping cost is minimized no matter where you are located.

 

Q: Which countries is the campaign open to?

A: Just about anywhere! We’re using multiple couriers so that we have full worldwide coverage.

 

Q: Does illumy come with a warranty?

A: Yes. Your sleep mask is covered by a one-year replacement warranty.

 

Q: Do I need Bluetooth to program illumy?

A: We designed illumy to use a platform-independent programming method. Your settings can be synced using most mobile phones, PCs and Mac devices. Since we use audio tones to program illumy, just about any device with a browser and sound output can be used to transfer your settings to your sleep mask. No pairing, no conflicts between multiple devices, and no worries about compatibility.

Of course, the most convenient way to program your sleep mask is using the iPhone or Android app.

 

Q: Do I need to use the programming cable to sync my settings?

A: In many cases the programming cable is the most reliable method. However, phones with accurate audio reproduction from the phone’s speaker can be used to program illumy wirelessly through audible tones. Check out our YouTube video to see how it works: 


 

Q: Will illumy help me stay asleep during the night?

A: It sure does. Illumy is designed to block out external light. If someone turns on the light during the night, you won’t even notice.

 

Q: I often work night shift; can I use illumy during the day?

A: illumy is ideal for night shift workers who need to sleep during the day. The red sunset helps you relax and prepare for sleep, and the blue sunrise will help you get ready for that next overnighter. The alarm can be set for any time of day or night.

 

Q: Are there other ways I can use illumy?

A: illumy can be used to get a boost in the afternoon. A power nap has been shown to increase productivity while exposure to blue light can boost alertness. Why not combine the two? Set a 10-minute sunrise for 30 minutes from now, put on illumy, and wake up refreshed after a 30-minute nap.

Q: Does illumy do sleep tracking?

A: No. We know that most people who are interested in sleep tracking already use a device such as a Fitbit or smartphone app. We focus on accurate light control/illumination and user comfort for the best sleep possible.

"Congratulations on illumy, it is an impressive device. It seems very well made and is quite comfortable."-Justyn BUK
 
 
At Sound Oasis, we are passionate about helping people to sleep better. Our complete line of products has always focused on helping people fall asleep and stay asleep - naturally. illumy, the latest product in our line of sleep masks, expands on this goal by recognizing that waking refreshed and relaxed is just as important as falling asleep easily. Waking up to a blaring alarm clock is not only annoying, you often wake up during the deepest part of your sleep, and that can leave you groggy all morning.illumy was envisioned by our team to let everyone benefit from this science of lightdeveloped for NASA.We are very proud of this product and very proud of the team that brings it to you. We encourage you to try illumy for yourself and see what a great night's sleep can be.
 

 

 



Troy Anderson - Co-Founder
Mr. Anderson graduated with a  Bachelor of Commerce degree in marketing from the University of Calgary and an MBA degree in international business from the University of Leuven in Belgium.  Mr. Anderson has served in various product marketing and new business development capacities with Black & Decker Canada (where he met his future business partner, Rudy Vandenbelt), Black & Decker U.S. and The Schawbel Corporation (a Boston based R&D firm). Troy and Rudy have invented and successfully commercialized a multitude of “first in the world” consumer products.

Rudy Vandenbelt – Director of R&D / Co-Founder
Rudy graduated with a Bachelor of Applied Science in Mechanical Engineering from Queen’s University in Kingston, Canada.  He began his product development career at Black and Decker which coincidentally is where he and his current business partner Troy Anderson first met.  Since 1994 the two partners have managed the development, manufacture, and sale to retail clients of over 100 of their own unique and proprietary consumer products and appliances.

Philippe Genereux – Technical lead
Phil holds a Bachelor’s degree in Aerospace Engineering and a Master's in Mechanical Engineering. He started his career as a partner in a medical device startup creating a product from his University research. His affinity for research and new ideas continues as he works on as many aspects of product design and invention as he can possibly manage. This approach has led the team to file patents for medical devices, air cleaners, and sleep technology.

Adam Clarke – Software Developer
Adam holds a Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering. He has 3 years of experience in designing, prototyping, and manufacturing of consumer goods. His love of model building and tinkering since a young age has given him the many skills necessary for product development. Self taught in the areas of software development, he has contributed to the design and function of websites and developed successful apps across multiple platforms.
 

 
     
Everyone knows someone who would love a natural sleep alternative that WORKS. Share our campaign with your friends on social media! 
 


 







 

 
Q: Can you adjust the brightness of the illumy sunset?
A: Yes. In the sunset mode, press and hold the sleep button. The red sunset will dim as you hold the button. Release your finger when you have reached your preferred sunset brightness.
 
Q: Will the head strap fit both large and small heads?
A: Yes, illumy has an adjustable Velcro® strap so it comfortably fits all sizes of heads.
 
Q: How does the Sleep Enhancement work? 
A: If you suffer from insomnia or need extra help waking up, our optional Sleep Enhancement® technology uses pulsing lights to help. At bedtime, the dimming sunset will pulse at increasingly slower Delta frequencies consistent with falling asleep, and in the morning the “blue sky” light will pulse at increasingly faster Alpha frequencies to assist with waking and alertness. You can turn this feature on or off in the illumy app. 
 
Q: Can you only adjust the illumy settings with the illumy app on a smartphone or tablet?
A: No, you can also program your illumy using your computer by visiting this page on the Sound Oasis website: www.glotosleep.com/programmer/. Select your illumy alarm settings, connect your illumy to the computer with the programming cable, and press the sync button.
 
Q: Do I need to use illumy every day?
A: Everyone is unique. Some people use the sunset every night to distract from racing thoughts and their unreasonably long to-do lists. Some people use the sunset on nights when it’s particularly difficult to fall asleep (the same way a lot of people use our nature sound machines).
Others use illumy during particular seasons of the year. December to March can be pretty dreary in the morning, and one of the best ways to overcome this sleep inertia is with illumy's sunrise.
Over time you’ll find the right combination, but we think a lot of people are going to enjoy illumy every day.
 
Q: Where can I download the illumy app?
A: The app can be found here:
                    
 
Q: How long can I expect the battery to last?A: If you use illumy every night, you can expect about 2 weeks of battery life. This will depend on your settings, of course. Shorter sunset and sunrise settings will extend this time.
 
Q: illumy has a washable cover—what is the best way to wash it?A: The electronics should not be submerged in water, so the best way to wash the cover would be to follow these simple steps:
1.       Remove the strap.
2.       Open the zipper.
3.       Remove the electronics module.
4.       Place the cover and strap in the washing machine and use a gentle wash cycle.
5.       Allow the cover and strap to air dry.
6.       Reinsert the electronics module into the cover and replace the strap. You’re all set for another great night’s sleep!The foam can also be washed with a mild detergent and warm water using a soft cloth.
 
Q: When will I receive illumy?A: We are working to have stock available by April. The earliest backers will receive illumy even sooner, as stock comes off the production line. We’ll do our best to deliver to all of our backers by April 2017. We’ll keep you updated as the campaign progresses and after the campaign, so you’ll always have a good idea of what to expect.
 
Q: How do you determine your shipping prices?A: We use actual shipping prices that we were quoted by various couriers. We chose the best value for each location so your shipping cost is minimized no matter where you are located.
 
Q: Which countries is the campaign open to?A: Just about anywhere! We’re using multiple couriers so that we have full worldwide coverage.
 
Q: Does illumy come with a warranty?A: Yes. Your sleep mask is covered by a one-year replacement warranty.
 
Q: Do I need Bluetooth to program illumy?
A: We designed illumy to use a platform-independent programming method. Your settings can be synced using most mobile phones, PCs and Mac devices. Since we use audio tones to program illumy, just about any device with a browser and sound output can be used to transfer your settings to your sleep mask. No pairing, no conflicts between multiple devices, and no worries about compatibility.
Of course, the most convenient way to program your sleep mask is using the iPhone or Android app.
 
Q: Do I need to use the programming cable to sync my settings?
A: In many cases the programming cable is the most reliable method. However, phones with accurate audio reproduction from the phone’s speaker can be used to program illumy wirelessly through audible tones. Check out our YouTube video to see how it works: 
 
Q: Will illumy help me stay asleep during the night?
A: It sure does. Illumy is designed to block out external light. If someone turns on the light during the night, you won’t even notice.
 
Q: I often work night shift; can I use illumy during the day?
A: illumy is ideal for night shift workers who need to sleep during the day. The red sunset helps you relax and prepare for sleep, and the blue sunrise will help you get ready for that next overnighter. The alarm can be set for any time of day or night.
 
Q: Are there other ways I can use illumy?
A: illumy can be used to get a boost in the afternoon. A power nap has been shown to increase productivity while exposure to blue light can boost alertness. Why not combine the two? Set a 10-minute sunrise for 30 minutes from now, put on illumy, and wake up refreshed after a 30-minute nap.
Q: Does illumy do sleep tracking?A: No. We know that most people who are interested in sleep tracking already use a device such as a Fitbit or smartphone app. We focus on accurate light control/illumination and user comfort for the best sleep possible.

story:
Your dirty pillowcase is the leading cause of breakouts & damaged hair.


Sleep Away is a product designed out of a necessity. Our team had grown tired of placing clean t-shirts or towels over our pillows each night. We wanted a clean sleeping surface, but doing Laundry Everyday was out of the question.


So we decided to look at what is wrong with current pillowcases. And after identifying a few crucial flaws we knew where to take our own pillowcase project. 


We set out to design a pillowcase perfect for travel & nightly use in the home. Easier to change than other pillowcases and available in sets to help you avoid the wash. Soft, 100% bamboo fabric that is antibacterial, anti-fungal, anti-odor. Wake up in the morning feeling refreshed with less breakouts, bed head & damaged hair




Sleep Away in Color

Sleep Away is available in both White and Black. 
For the final model, the velcro of the white pillowcase will have white velcro, and the black model, black velcro.

Our velcro has an Open/Close average of 10,000 times and bamboo requires 1/3 of the water to wash when compared with cotton.

Each Sleep Away comes with a mesh washing bag to help protect your velcro and bamboo cases in the wash.



Sizing

We are bringing our standard twin sized (20"x26") pillowcases to you. We wanted to also add King & Queen sized pillowcases to our inventory.

1. King Sized Pillowcases (20" x  36")

2. Queen Sized Pillowcases (20" x  30")

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $5,000 to keep our production line both ongoing & growing. 

This money will allow us to produce and ship standard sized pillowcases. The hope is to bring our next product line to fruition through our first and second stretch goals, the king & queen sized pillowcases.


The Impact

More than trying to sell a product, we are trying to change the way pillowcases are both perceived and used. For travel, hosting company, and nightly usage these pillowcases are aimed at providing a soft, clean sleeping surface every night.

Ultimately, the goal of our product is to get our products into retail stores & on amazon prime. By backing our project, you help us demonstrate sales numbers to these larger companies.

Perhaps most importantly, these pillowcases have the potential to be effectively used in hotels, hospitals, and third world countries/disaster relief with their patented, easy-to-change design and antibacterial fabric. 

Risks & Challenges

We have worked once with our manufacturer on this same project in order to fix any kinks that may occur in a second run.
Though this run may have its own challenges. For instance, we may have to change our packaging of stretch goals due to the larger size of king/queen pillow cases, This may add unexpected costs and and delays if this is the case.
Shipping international is a fun game. A game I like to win, but nonetheless it can add unexpected costs and delays with customs. If our same fulfillment center goes to plan, however, we hope to not have any problems shipping international.

Other Ways You Can Help

Almost more valuable than backing our project financially is backing our project on social media. Endorsing our project simply by sharing on Facebook and sending an email to your friends & family. It goes a long way to helping us get the word out about Sleep Away - The Pillowcase Revolution

story:
“Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.”


― Hippocrates― 

Healthy Eating with right portions can help you lose weight and enjoy a healthy life. But how does work in practice? Many people will weigh food, and then face the time consuming steps of entering weight values properly in a completely separate device. The Smart Chef Food Scale & app will greatly simplify the process of changing your diet, one portion at a time.

 

Smart Food Scale

the Smart Chef app

 

 

Portion Education

Food Tracking to 3rd Party apps

 

IntakeCurve

 

SmartLogs

 

Smart Chef App Download

For more details on the Smart Chef app visit www.smartchef.me/tutorial
 

Project Status

In the last 15 months, we invested our efforts in the following:

  • Industrial Design and Firmware design to maximize usability and functionality of the smart food scale
  • Tooling for mass production
  • Packaging design to ensure low shipping cost to anywhere around the world.
  • Product Certifications: FCC, IC, CE, R&TTE, RoHS
  • Connected with thousands of dietitians around the world to define useful mobile app functions
  • Smart Chef app
    • 3rd party diet tracking integration with Fitbit, Fatsecret, Weightwatchers, HowMuchPhe, SuperTracker and more to come
    • Easy Tool for Unit Conversion
    • UI for easy Portion Education
    • UI for monitor food intake behavior: average bite size, intake frequency...
    • Nutrition Education Library for hosting various nutrition education videos
    • App feature for weight logging
    • Baby Formula mixing (work in progress)
    • Recipe Management (work in progress)
  • Secured US and International Patents on the Smart Chef Food Scales

Note: We are not affiliated with Fitbit, MyFinessPal, Weightwatchers and HowMuchPhe in any way.

 

Why Crowdfunding

To keep the Smart Chef Food Scale affordable, we are raising fund to do a larger batch production. Please support us by becoming a owner of Smart Chef Pocket Smart Food Scale and give us your feedbacks so we can improve the app for you.

 

FAQ

How the Smart Chef Scale compares to the regular nutritional food scale?

 

How to recharge the builtin battery?

The product comes with a standard USB charging cable which you can connect to your USB power adopter or a computer's USB slot.

 

Press Kit Press Kit

 

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or family member who needs this!
We can't do this without you.

 

Thank you!

We would like to thank the dietitians who have been providing us valuable feedbacks on refining the Smart Chef app and media reviewers who help us with packaging design.

Thank you for visiting us and taking the time to learn about our story. 

Working on projects from concept to realization always gives us great pleasure, especially with incredible teammates since 2010. And knowing that such solution can help people enjoy their life a little more fuels our drive to work harder. 
 

Product Warranty

The Smart Chef Pocket Smart Food Scale comes with 1 years limited warranty on all electronic parts and labor.

Risks & Challenges

We have removed most of the risks for you by making the Smart Chef Pocket Smart Food Scale ready-to-ship and certification ready before Christmas 2017. However, shipping delays may still occur for various logistical reasons.

We would also like to inform you that the Smart Chef app is an ongoing project with new releases every week. Some of the app features may only be available in Smart Chef iOS version. We are working hard to synchronize all iOS app features to Smart Chef Android by December 2017.

story:
Facem un apel către tine să ne ajuți să promovăm modul de viață activ, energic și sănătos! 

Am adunat mii de istorii ale femeilor care nu au destul timp să meargă la sala de sport, care au copii mici, sau sânt departe de casă. Femei care conștientizează importanța unui mod de viață echilibrat și activ și vor să îl adopte. Femei care vor să fie mai fericite în propriul corp.

Astfel, am hotărât să revoluționăm serviciile fitness și wellness prin crearea Unicasport.com – prima platformă de fitness online made in Moldova.

Contribuie și primește:

1$ = 14 antrenamente

5$ = 25 antrenamente

10$ = 56 antrenamente

20$ = 84 antrenamente

35$ = 98 antrenamente + Regim alimentar individual

50$ = 154 antrenamente + Regim alimentar individual

100$ = 182 antrenamente + Regim alimentar individual + training online cu Galina Tomaș

Unicasport.com este antrenorul și nutriționistul tău personal – sistemul adaptează programul de sport și wellness exact după necesitățile tale, luând în calcul într-un mod inteligent și științific specificul organismului, siluetei, metabolismului, pentru a atinge scopul pe care ți l-ai propus – slăbire, modelare sau tonifiere.

Nu vei fi singură – pe lângă instructorii Unica Sport cu care poți comunica online, vei avea o comunitate de alți utilizatori care au același scop ca și tine pentru a împărtăși istoriile de succes.

Unicasport.com este ghidul tău spre un rezultat garantat. Dacă nu ești mulțumită de experiența Unicasport.com, noi îți întoarcem banii.


 

Iată un scurt demo al unuia dintre zecile de video-antrenamente pe care le pregătim pentru tine:





Unicasport.com permite comandarea unui serviciu suplimentar – testare nutrițională și fiziologică. Acesta este un suport valoros dacă vrei să obții mai mult de la antrenamentele după metoda Unica. Testarea este o ”consultație” digitală care ia în calcul o serie de informații despre tine și generează recomandări complexe cu privire la activitate fizică (pulsul optim pentru a obține rezultatul programului de sport, tipul complexului de exerciții), fonul metabolic și homonal, necesitatea consultării anumitor specialiști conform afecțiunilor sistemelor de organe interne. Mai mult, testarea îți oferă un regim alimentar pentru zilele cu și fără antrenamente, plus tabele calorice și alternative alimentare pentru a diversifica regimul într-un mod cât mai sănătos.



Deja am investit peste 50 mii Euro pentru a crea baza platformei unicasport.com și pentru filmarea a aproximativ 50 videouri din cele 100 planificate pentru faza inițială. Suntem la jumătate de cale, și nu vrem să dăm înapoi. Ceea ce am început este mult prea important și credem în impactul pe care îl putem produce cu ajutorul acestui proiect inovativ. Crearea platformei este un proces complex și necesită resurse mai mari decât avem disponibile la moment. Sunt două direcții majore pentru care vor fi folosite fondurile colectate cu ajutorul vostru:

Programare: Cea mai considerabilă parte din suma necesară pentru finalizarea proiectului va merge pentru programarea platformei unicasport.com. Web developerii care deja au pus bazele sistemului vor continua să dezvolte unicasport.com astfel încât video-urile cu exerciții sunt corect generate pentru fiecare tip de antrenament, în funcție de programul individualizat. Alte funcționalități care urmează să fie integrate sunt monitorizarea progresului și producerea graficelor, trecerea de la un program la altul, inclusiv modificarea programului dacă utilizatoarea este însărcinată, crearea posibilității comunicării online cu instructorul, și oferirea bonusurilor. Ulterior, vom testa platforma și introduce ajustările necesare pentru ca aceasta să funcționeze coerent. Această parte necesită minim 25 000 Euro din suma totală.

Filmarea video-urilor cu antrenamente: Vrem ca utilizatorii platformei să se bucure de o experiență cât mai diversăși interactivă– astfel, unicasport.com va găzdui o bază de date de peste 100 antrenamente video, generate inteligent în dependență de individualizarea programului sport. Pentru a filma cele 50 antrenamente rămase plus antrenamentele bonus, avem nevoie de 25 000 Euro. Resursele vor fi utilizate pentru chiria spațiilor pentru filmări, serviciile companiei care realizează filmările și montarea celor peste 50 ore de video, și echipa de platou. 

Timp de aproape 20 ani, Unica Sport a lucrat intens pentru a cunoaște femeile și a le susține în calea spre o sănătate mai puternicăși o siluetă de invidiat. Unica Sport este un proiect început dintr-o cauză socială care s-a transformat în decursul anilor într-o afacere de succes. Scopul nostru este să educăm femeile pe subiectul modului sănătos sănătos de viață prin metode individualizate pentru ele. Galina Tomaș - Doctor în științe medicale - a elaborat un program de remodelare corporală care îmbină coerent efortul fizic dozat, alimentația raționalăși aplicarea proceselor metabolice.

Programul, fiind aplicat de o echipă de profesioniști în scopul promovării modului sănătos de viață, astăzi este cunoscut și pantentat drept Metoda Unica.  Peste 70 mii de clienți au demonstrat rezultate impresionante obținute prin această abordare: -39 kg, -48 kg, -55 kg, -60 kg, greutatea maximă dată jos fiind de -71 kg!

Astăzi vrem să aducem serviciile noastre la un nou nivel, și să utilizăm mediul digital pentru a continua să ajutăm miile de femei care vor să fie mai sănătoase și să obțină silueta dorită.

din suma necesară pentru finalizarea proiectului va merge pentru programarea
platformei unicasport.com. Web developerii care deja au pus bazele sistemului
vor continua să dezvolte unicasport.com
astfel încât video-urile cu exerciții
sunt corect generate pentru fiecare tip de antrenament, în
funcție de
programul individualizat. Alte funcționalități care urmează
să fie integrate sunt monitorizarea
progresului și producerea
graficelor, trecerea de la un program la altul, inclusiv modificarea
programului dacă utilizatoarea este însărcinată, crearea posibilității comunicării
online cu instructorul, și oferirea
bonusurilor. Ulterior, vom testa platforma și introduce
ajustările necesare pentru ca aceasta să funcționeze
coerent. Această parte necesită minim 25 000 Euro din suma totală.Filmarea video-urilor cu antrenamente: Vrem ca utilizatorii platformei să se bucure de o experiență cât mai diversăși interactivă– astfel, unicasport.com va găzdui o bază de date de peste 100 antrenamente video, generate inteligent în dependență de individualizarea programului sport. Pentru a filma cele 50 antrenamente rămase plus antrenamentele bonus, avem nevoie de 25 000 Euro. Resursele vor fi utilizate pentru chiria spațiilor pentru filmări, serviciile companiei care realizează filmările și montarea celor peste 50 ore de video, și echipa de platou. Timp de aproape 20 ani, Unica Sport a
lucrat intens pentru a cunoaște femeile și
a le susține în
calea spre o sănătate mai puternicăși
o siluetă de invidiat. Unica Sport este un
proiect început dintr-o cauză
socială care s-a transformat în
decursul anilor într-o afacere de succes. Scopul nostru este să educăm femeile
pe subiectul modului sănătos sănătos de viață
prin metode individualizate pentru ele. Galina Tomaș - Doctor în
științe
medicale - a elaborat un program de remodelare corporală
care îmbină
coerent efortul
fizic dozat, alimentația
raționalăși aplicarea proceselor
metabolice. 
Programul, fiind aplicat de o echipă de
profesioniști în
scopul promovării modului sănătos
de viață, astăzi este cunoscut și
pantentat drept Metoda Unica.  Peste 70 mii de clienți
au demonstrat rezultate impresionante obținute prin această
abordare: -39 kg, -48 kg, -55 kg, -60 kg, greutatea maximă dată jos fiind de -71 kg!
Astăzi vrem să aducem serviciile noastre la un nou nivel, și să utilizăm mediul digital pentru a continua să ajutăm miile de femei care vor să fie mai sănătoase și să obțină silueta dorită.

story:
My brother Jeff C. 23, is fighting for his life, after being struck by an van. He is in critical condition with severe head and leg injuries. He went in for brain surgery on Thursday January 12th 2012 to remove half of his skull because he had 10+ skull fractures. The doctors hope that they will be able to use the skull they have harvesting in a few months, although because of the amount of fractures they might have to mold him a new piece. His second surgery on Friday January 13th 2012 placed a steel rod and plate in his lower leg. The damage to his leg is irreversible. We also don't know the extent of his head injuries until Jeff is able to speak and follow commands. Jeff has no health insurance to provide assistance with medical and aftercare costs, so anything contributed will be helpful in his recovery.

       Jeff is known for his high work ethics, would ride his bike nearly 30 miles round trip just to get to and from his job. He is a strong, funny, talented young man who has so much more to give us. He is a son to my parents, a brother to me and my two brothers, and also an uncle to three beautiful young children who look up to him and miss him.
       
       We all know these are very hard times for everyone, although even a small dollar donation will be greatly appreciated. I don't have anything to give back in return, although our thanks and prayers will go out to you and your families. May god bless all of you who are reading and keeping my brother in your thoughts.

story:
Short Summary

Camp Challenge is a one-week summer camp for kids with cancer and hematological disorders and their siblings. Our goal is to give campers the same summer camp experience every young boy and girl should get. In spite of their illnesses, campers play sports, go canoeing, do arts and crafts, and participate in a myriad of other activities with other kids facing the same obstacles they are.

We spend all year raising money for Camp so no camper's family has to pay a dime. The money we raise goes directly into Camp, paying for things such as transportation, water slides, s'mores, and luau decorations. Our staff, from doctors to counselors, volunteers their time. 

Each year we look forward to putting a smile on our campers' faces and helping them make the same childhood summer memories that many of us have had. We hope that you can support Camp Challenge in creating another great year.

What We Need & What You Get

     On average it costs $750 to sponsor a camper for the week of camp. Camp Challenge receives more than one hundred campers a year. The number of campers received is steadily rising. This campaign will help the camp continue to fund campers for this week of fun.

As a token of our gratitude for assisting in funding Camperships (Camper SCHOLARSHIPS) we will be offering a few perks. If you donate $25, we will send you a Camp Challenge postcard. If you donate $50, we will send you a Camp Challenge pin. If you donate $100, we will send you a Camp Challenge T-shirts. If you donate $250, we will send you a Camp Challenge Flag that is signed by the campers and staff.

The Impact

     Camp Challenge is embarking on her 28th year of fun, and we have created a family environment for children for nearly three decades. Many of our staff members were campers who returned to volunteer at the camp, because Camp Challenge is "Their Happy Place” and they want it to be the same for these children.

Risks & Challenges

Camp Challenge has yet to turn away a camper, and over the years, our family has grown. Almost 30 years ago, camp consisted of a handful of kids and their parents. Today, more than 100 campers attend Camp Challenge free of cost. That growth requires more counselors and medical staff, more bunks and meals, and more PRIZES for our famous carnival. The practical effect of this is Camp has needed to raise considerably more money over time.

Just as Camp has a history of great volunteers who come back year after year, the organization has also had outstanding relationships with several companies and individuals who raise money for us. In order to accommodate our growing number of campers, Camp Challenge realizes that it must continue to develop new sources of funding. We hope Indiegogo is one way we can maintain a free summer camp for all our new campers.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, there are other ways that you can still help out. Spread the word about the campaign to your friends and family. Also, you can share this page on your social media, by using the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
We have a new goal to reach $1500.

Lets make this happen!!


35 Days and 4000 Miles 

My name is Doug Michael and my best friend Trey Gray has Huntington's Disease (HD). 

(Pictured Left to Right) Trey and Doug 2003

While I have supported HD for over a decade now I want to do something big to bring awareness to the cause and raise money for research. So, I have decided to ride a bike across the United States. Your help can bring about more awareness of this disease while also helping raise the funds needed to find a cure. If everyone who knows someone with HD were to contribute just $2 to this cause think about the impact and the difference this would make. Help me get the word out and let's make a difference!

What is Huntington's Disease

Huntington's disease (HD) is a neurodegenerative genetic disorder that affects muscle coordination and leads to mental decline and behavioral symptoms. There is no cure for Huntington's Disease. Huntington's Disease usually begins between 35 and 44 years of age and with a life expectancy of 10 to 25 years in adults and cases starting before the age of 21 years life expectancy is only 10 years. Some people have described it as having MS, Parkinson and Dementia all in one.

The Journey 

I will be riding a bicycle for about 3500 from California to New York. I'll be starting at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, CA, then traveling to Nashville, TN and then from there I will be heading north to South Bend, IN. After I leave South Bend I will be heading east to the Big Apple, New York City, where my ride will end at Yankee Stadium. During my ride I will be stopping in communities to do interviews on radio, television, newspaper and any other types of media outlets telling people about what I am doing and why we need their support for HD. I will be taking pictures and posting updates on the website that we will be setting up so you can follow the Journey daily. I won't be alone, coming with me in the support vehicle and sometimes riding himself will be Trey Gray. Some of you may know Trey from his work with Huntington's Disease Society of America as their former spokesperson,   the HD documentary film Alive and Well that he was in or for being a professional musician the last 20 years playing and touring with Faith Hill, Jewel, Brooks n Dunn and Ronnie Dunn. 

Trey Gray 2011

We are raising $40,000. The money we raise will be going to "The Trey Gray Fund for Huntington's Disease" at the Vanderbilt University research center for HD and for covering the expenses of traveling 3500 miles. The expenses include renting a support vehicle (a small RV) to carry the support team, extra equipment that is needed such as spare tires and an extra bike, hotels, gas, a website so the public can follow our progress and a PR person to help us get to interviews on the different media outlets while we are on the journey. It will take us between 35 to 50 days depending on weather, rode conditions and the number of interviews that take place.

What You Get When You Help 

First we want you all to know that all donation go directly to finding a cure and raising awereness. Second, we've kept our perks pretty conservative as we want the funds we raise to go to the cause and not the expenses of paying for merchandise but Country Recording Artists Rodney Atkins has donated Meet and Greet Passes for one of our perks. Big Thanks to Rodney Atkins!

Who would like to receive 2 free HD t-shirts and a Meet and Greet pass good for 2 to Rodney Atkins? We are starting a Referral Contest. Simply login to your indiegogo account or create one (it's free), Go to our campaign page and then share (Facebook, Twitter or email) and encourage people to donate. At the end of the campaign the top two people that have brought in the most donations from their referrals will each receive 2 free t-shirts and the person who raised the most will also get the "Meet and Greet" passes. The more times you share the campaign the better chance you have of winning. Good luck and God Bless!!!

  • 2 dollars. See your name with a Special Thanks on the website              
  • 10 dollars.See your name and photo with a Special Thanks on the website
  • 30 dollars. See your name and photo with a Special Thanks on the website and an awesome T-shirt saying you supported the cause
  • 59 dollars (3 Available) BEST VALUE! See your name and photo with a Special Thanks on the website and 2 (Two) awesome T-shirt saying you supported the cause and a pair of concert played drum sticks autographed by Trey Gray. 


  • 100 dollars(500) See your name and photo with a Special Thanks on the website and a personally autographed drum head to you from Trey Gray (Credits: Faith Hill, Jewel, Brooks n Dunn, Ronnie Dunn)
  • 250 dollars (100) See your name and photo with a Special Thanks on the website as a V.I.P. supporter. In addition you will receive one of those awesome T-shirts a numbered limited addition personally autographed drum head and a pair of drum sticks that Trey has played with in concert. Only 100 of these to give away.
  • 300 dollars (4) See your name and photo on the website as a Heavenly supporter. In addition you will receive one of those awesome T-shirts and Trey Gray and Doug Michael will come to your home and help you make Potato Salad. If you are on the route to NYC we'll stop by and if your not we'll come right after the ride in July. You supply the ingredients and we'll supply the love.
  • 250 dollars (4) See your name and photo on the website as a Rock Star supporter. In addition you will receive one of those awesome T-shirts and one Meet and Greet Pass, good for two people, to meet with Country Recording Artist Rodney Atkins at  a show of your choice during his 2015 tour where he is doing Meet and Greets (Most shows will have a Meet and Greet). (Academy of Country Music winner  -  Male Vocalist of the Year in 2006). Limited to only 5. Concert tickets are not included with the Meet and Greet Passes.
  • 500 dollars. See your name and photo on the website as a Bronze Sponsor supporter. In addition you will receive one of those awesome T-shirts also saying that you are a Sponsor. By being a Bronze Sponsor you've taken that extra step to really help.
  • 1000 dollars (50) See your name and photo on the website as a Silver Sponsor supporter. In addition you will receive one of those awesome T-shirts also saying you are a Sponsor and your name or your business name on the side of the support vehicle as a Silver Sponsor. You are letting everyone know at this level you are not going to let HD win.

Let's all join together to make this a success and to find a cure!

The Impact of Your Help

Anyone that knows someone that has HD understands how important it is to find a cure and for the millions of people that have never heard of HD it's important to make them aware of this tragic disease. By finding a cure for HD it could easily lead to cures for other diseases like Parkinson's, Alzheimer's and Dementia. 

HD does not have that big household name attached to it like Michael J. Fox and Parkinson's or Lou Gehrig and ALS. The most famous person to have HD is legendary folk artist Woody Guthrie and while many people don't know his name almost everyone has heard his song "This Land is you Land". 

  • With $2 or $2500 you are personally investing in making a difference in helping to find a cure. No matter what you can do your help becomes priceless. 
  • The awareness and the money raised will go along way in having a long term impact in the fight against HD and for finding a cure. The research facility at Vanderbilt University is making a lot of progress in its research in HD and the donations you make could lead to that big break through that we are all looking for. Please help us in this battle!
  • Helping others will always make you feel good!
  • All donations towards finding a cure and raising awareness!

You Can Help Us In Other Ways

We understand that not everyone can help financially but there are other ways you can help.

  • Tell EVERYONE you know about what we are doing!
  • If you know anyone that works at a Radio Station, Television Network, Newspaper, an on line media outlet or any other forms of media that can helps us with getting a news story or interview about what we are doing, we would love to hear from you.
  • Come join me on your bike for any distance you would like to ride.
  • If you know any corporate sponsors that help us reduce our expenses so more funds go to Huntington's Disease research.
  • Tell EVERYONE you know about what we are doing! (It's so important I thought I should say it again)
  • Please share on Facebook, Twitter or any other social media outlet.
THANK YOU for all of your help and support!
