story:
MY STORY

Since well before the age of ten, I noticed a slight change in me, at times feeling irritable, distraught and lacked a sense of wellbeing and belonging.  After the premature death of my father from alcoholism, I soon began drinking and found some bizarre relief by the use of the drink, which was not related to its intoxicating power.  Little did I know that for the next forty-five years I would suffer anxiety, the panic feeling of impending doom and depression, only to be relieved by a period of drinking alcohol.   However the eventual intoxication and resulting behaviors often resulted in fights, jails, and rehabilitation centers.  I sought other drugs for relief.  Finally, federal prison resulted in the loss of everything, including the desire for life.

I found myself sober because of confinement, continuing to struggle with the insufferable mental anguish of sobriety.  My study of medicine led me to the subject of brain metabolism and I investigated the possibility that brain metabolism played a role in my symptoms.  The symptoms were the need to drink alcohol to feel normal and the misery of sobriety.  

Not one medical instructor, personal physician or alcoholism rehabilitation counselor had ever mentioned the possibility of a genetic metabolic disorder in my brain nor suggested a metabolic scan of my brain be performed.  Not even one considered that I drank alcohol for reasons other than intoxication and selfishness.  Yet, I was led to all of the evidence needed to propose a new theory. It is clear that as of today, February 5, 2013, the medical community is completely ignorant of the true nature of alcoholism and causing harm with their treatment of alcoholism.

An amazing insight ensued as I followed the trail of information answering a series of needed questions until the answer lay before me.  Immediately I made use of the information and within four days experienced that same special feeling I got from alcohol, without the intoxication or hangover.  I soon was to experience a complete sense of wellbeing and ability to think clearly while sober.   I grew towards complete resolution of my sober irritability, melancholy and mental anguish.  The ‘dry drunk’ was gone.  I was on to something. 

I enthusiastically began sharing this knowledge with my sober alcoholic friends, they eagerly took the knowledge, used it in their lives and they too began to experience increased feelings of wellbeing, calmness, and clear thinking and a decrease in their particular negative symptoms of sobriety. 

I  present here the known facts from the literature and my own personal experience. I propose for the first time in man’s history that Alcoholism results from a metabolic brain disorder similar to a diabetic-type condition.  This creates a situation whereby the alcoholic brain uses alcohol as fuel or food for the starving afflicted brain centers with no particular interest in the intoxicating effects.

More directed research will be needed of this disease if the insulin receptors, needed for glucose transport, play a role as in diabetes of muscle and adipose tissue or another yet unknown specific neuronal glucose transport system will be discovered. 

I have coined the name of the true disease: Metabolic Brain Cell Disease Type Basal Ganglia and the term Brain Starvation Syndrome.  These are the causes of the behavior of alcoholism.

I went on to develop Dr. Hershlines Double Dose Packs 50/50 Brain Formula and the Fix-Zy Oil.

Currently I am treating about 30 alcoholics with the Fix-Zy Oil in a one arm clinical study and having great success.

Because of the costs of manufacture funds are needed increase our volume.

A suggested price is $50 for 60 packets.  This also may include marketing perks.  two thousand orders of 60 packets will allow us to begin manufacturing.

Can you imagine the impact this will have on the understanding and treatment of alcoholism?  Yes, this will save lives!  Yes this will bring the treatment of alcoholism out the paganistic rituals into current treatment standards.  It is about time!

  Dr. Roger Hershline  PHD MD
story_txt:
MY STORY
Since well before the age of ten, I
noticed a slight change in me, at times feeling irritable, distraught and
lacked a sense of wellbeing and belonging. 
After the premature death of my father from alcoholism, I soon began
drinking and found some bizarre relief by the use of the drink, which was not
related to its intoxicating power. 
Little did I know that for the next forty-five years I would suffer
anxiety, the panic feeling of impending doom and depression, only to be relieved
by a period of drinking alcohol.   However the eventual intoxication and
resulting behaviors often resulted in fights, jails, and rehabilitation centers.
 I sought other drugs for relief.  Finally, federal prison resulted in the loss
of everything, including the desire for life.
I found myself sober because of
confinement, continuing to struggle with the insufferable mental anguish of
sobriety.  My study of medicine led me to
the subject of brain metabolism and I investigated the possibility that brain
metabolism played a role in my symptoms. 
The symptoms were the need to drink alcohol to feel normal and the
misery of sobriety.  Not one medical instructor, personal
physician or alcoholism rehabilitation counselor had ever mentioned the
possibility of a genetic metabolic disorder in my brain nor suggested a
metabolic scan of my brain be performed. 
Not even one considered that I drank alcohol for reasons other than intoxication
and selfishness.  Yet, I was led to all
of the evidence needed to propose a new theory. It is clear that as of today,
February 5, 2013, the medical community is completely ignorant of the true
nature of alcoholism and causing harm with their treatment of alcoholism.
An amazing insight ensued as I
followed the trail of information answering a series of needed questions until
the answer lay before me.  Immediately I made
use of the information and within four days experienced that same special
feeling I got from alcohol, without the intoxication or hangover.  I soon was to experience a complete sense of
wellbeing and ability to think clearly while sober.   I grew
towards complete resolution of my sober irritability, melancholy and mental
anguish.  The ‘dry drunk’ was gone.  I was on to something. I enthusiastically began sharing
this knowledge with my sober alcoholic friends, they eagerly took the
knowledge, used it in their lives and they too began to experience increased
feelings of wellbeing, calmness, and clear thinking and a decrease in their
particular negative symptoms of sobriety. 

I  present here the known facts from
the literature and my own personal experience. I propose for the first time in
man’s history that Alcoholism results from a metabolic brain disorder similar
to a diabetic-type condition.  This creates
a situation whereby the alcoholic brain uses alcohol as fuel or food for the
starving afflicted brain centers with no particular interest in the
intoxicating effects. 
More directed research will be
needed of this disease if the insulin receptors, needed for glucose transport, play
a role as in diabetes of muscle and adipose tissue or another yet unknown
specific neuronal glucose transport system will be discovered. I have coined the name of the true disease: Metabolic Brain Cell Disease Type Basal Ganglia and the term Brain Starvation Syndrome.  These are the causes of the behavior of alcoholism.I went on to develop Dr. Hershlines Double Dose Packs 50/50 Brain Formula and the Fix-Zy Oil.Currently I am treating about 30 alcoholics with the Fix-Zy Oil in a one arm clinical study and having great success.Because of the costs of manufacture funds are needed increase our volume.A suggested price is $50 for 60 packets.  This also may include marketing perks.  two thousand orders of 60 packets will allow us to begin manufacturing.Can you imagine the impact this will have on the understanding and treatment of alcoholism?  Yes, this will save lives!  Yes this will bring the treatment of alcoholism out the paganistic rituals into current treatment standards.  It is about time!
  Dr.
Roger Hershline  PHD MD

story:
DOCTORS LOVE CBD CLINIC

    

 

  

 

 

 

CBD CLINIC ointments and creams are made with natural ingredients, FDA-approved pain relievers like menthol, camphor and lidocaine, and Charlotte’s Web cannabidiol (CBD). Charlotte’s Web CBD oil, grown in Colorado, is the best because it is loaded with terpenes and is the purest quality available.  

CBD CLINIC is for All Types of Paim

Muscle Pain

Joint Pain

Ligament Pain

Tendon Pain

Nerve Pain

Cramps

Sprains

Arthritis

Back & Neck Pain

Arm & Shoulder Pain

Hip & Torso Pain

Hand & Wrist Pain

Leg & Knee Pain

Foot Pain

Repetitive Stress

Bruises

And pain associated with

Fibromyalgia

Multiple Sclerosis

Lyme Disease

Lupus

Neuropathy

Surgery

Medical Treatments

Sciatica
 

The Natural Science Behind Our Pain Relief Revolution

Each formula has three (3) foundational components for supporting rapid and lasting relief from joint and muscle pain, associated with daily living, sports injuries, arthritis, sprains, bruises and related types of inflammation:

1. Natural Emollients

The base formulations of our ointments and creams are made with all-natural emollients that are readily absorbed by human skin. CBD CLINIC emollients include organic beeswax, jojoba seed oil, cottonseed oil, and shea butter. These were selected and combined via a proprietary method which quickly delivers pain-relieving ingredients into the skin.

Comparatively, many other topical analgesic products use cheap, synthetic ingredients for their base, including benzyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, diglycol stearate, glyceryl monostearate, petrolatum, etc.

 

2. Powerful Terpenes

Terpenes (C10H16 molecules) produce analgesic action in acute and neuropathic pain by decreasing neuronal excitability through peripheral mechanisms. Menthol and Camphor are the two most widely used terpenes in topical pain management today. Terpenes are aromatic organic hydrocarbons found in the essential oils of plants. They produce the distinct aroma associated with each plant. The therapeutic effects of terpenes are widely recognized. Other terpenes (essential oils) in our products--including Eucalyptus, Tea Tree, Clove, Peppermint and Rich-Hemp extract—are combined with Menthol and/or Camphor.

 

3. Endocannabinoid Modulators

In the mid-1990s, discovery of the endocannabinoid enabled a major breakthrough in new therapies for reducing pain, inflammation and other ailments. The endocannabinoid system is a group of endogenous cannabinoid receptors located in the mammalian brain and throughout the central and peripheral nervous systems, consisting of neuromodulatory lipids and their receptors.

 

The endocannabinoid receptor system plays a significant role in regulating neurotransmitter function. One receptor that is being actively studied is called CB1. It is found in spinal and peripheral nervous tissue (including areas important for pain perception). Although research into modulation of the endocannabinoid system is still in its early phases, studies published in the British Journal of Pharmacology and elsewhere have reported that some terpenes have been identified as having allosteric modulator properties, capable of slowing down neurotransmitter signaling. These findings help us understand the therapeutic relevance and benefits that terpenes may have with pain perception and how they can support reductions in pain.

story:
Nous avons créé l’entreprise Lili smart en avril 2016 à Lyon. Cependant, l’idée même de concevoir un outil pour aider les familles accompagnant un proche fragilisé est née en 2007, lorsque la grand-mère d'Aymeric a été diagnostiquée malade d’Alzheimer.

L’idée d’un service permettant d’alléger le stress des familles qui assistent un proche dépendant n’a cessé de germer depuis. Nous avons alors décidé de mettre à profit les compétences d’ingénieur d'Aymeric pour créer un outil innovant et offrir aux familles une solution pour les accompagner au quotidien. Il nous aura fallu plusieurs années avant de pouvoir profiter d’une technologie existante pour développer notre projet et nous lancer dans l’aventure Lili smart en 2015.

 

 

 

Lili smart est avant tout une application dédiée aux familles. Grâce à elle, les aidants peuvent vérifier en un clin d’œil si tout va bien chez leur proche et être alerté en cas de problème. Ils sont moins stressés et disposent à tout moment, et depuis n'importe où, de toutes les informations nécessaires.

Pour assurer la collecte et la transmission de ces informations, l'application Lili smart repose sur deux autres éléments : une montre et des capteurs.

Au démarrage de Lili smart, les capteurs installés au domicile apprennent les habitudes de vie du proche pendant plusieurs jours. Ensuite Lili smart établit automatiquement une moyenne d'activité pour chaque capteur (10 ouvertures de frigo par jour, 3 utilisations du pilulier par jour, etc). Elle se basera sur celle-ci pour évaluer les changements de comportements et donner l'alerte aux aidants.

La montre contient une carte SIM et communique avec les capteurs sans réseau Internet. Le domicile du proche aidé n'a pas besoin d'être équipé d'une connexion WiFi.

 

Lili smart détecte les changements de comportement, qu'ils soient liés à l'évolution de la maladie, l'aggravation de troubles ou l'avancée en âge, et alerte automatiquement la famille. Cette fonctionnalité peut concerner l'alimentation (comme  ci-dessous), mais elle peut aussi s'appliquer à la prise des médicaments (capteur pilulier), à l'hygiène (capteur toilettes, porte de douche).

 

Installez un capteur sur la porte du réfrigérateur de votre proche et programmez les jours et plages horaires pour les rappels de repas. Votre proche reçoit les rappels directement sur la montre. Ils s'affichent sous forme de pictogramme avec des vibrations.
Le capteur détecte les mouvements de la porte et les communique via la montre. Si le capteur observe une irrégularité vous en êtes informé. Vous recevez instantanément une notification via votre application Lili smart pour vous informer que votre proche ne se nourrit potentiellement plus, ou de manière irrégulière.

 

Parmi ses fonctions d'alerte, Lili smart prévient aussi les aidants de la sortie du domicile de leur proche afin d'éviter qu'il ne s'égare

 

Installez un capteur sur la porte d'entrée de votre proche pour surveiller les sorties du domicile. Paramétrez les jours et les plages horaires autorisées avec votre application Lili smart.
Lorsque votre proche franchit la porte de son domicile, sa montre affiche automatiquement les noms et les coordonnées des aidants en continu en cas de désorientation. Vous recevez instantanément une notification via votre application Lili smart pour vous alerter de la sortie de votre proche. Vous pouvez alors le géolocaliser grâce à sa montre.

 

Parce que chaque famille est différente et que leurs besoins évoluent dans le temps, Lili smart s’adapte. C’est la raison pour laquelle nous avons créé plus de 50 fonctionnalités pour les assister au quotidien et leur proposer une solution personnalisée.

 

Toutes les fonctionnalités

Sécurité

  • Géolocalisation
  • Paramétrage de plages horaires et des jours
  • Alerte chute lourde
  • Alerte changement de comportement

Communiquer

  • Messagerie live
  • Contacts

S’organiser

  • Liste de tâches
  • Tirelire
  • Rappels de renouvellement d’ordonnance
  • Gestion des cercles d’aidants

Stimuler

  • Paramétrage de rappels vers la montre

 

 

Le mardi 21 février 2017, nous avons été choisis et mis à l'honneur à l'Élysée, à l'occasion du lancement de la 2ème édition de VivaTechnology, rendez-vous international des startups et passionnés de technologie. Aymeric et Vincent ont pu y présenter l'application à François Hollande.

 

En ce début d’année 2017, nous disposons d’une solution aboutie dont nous avons récemment lancé la commercialisation sur notre site www.lilismart.com.

Aujourd’hui, nous nous sommes donné pour objectif de réunir la somme de 10 000€ pour soutenir notre lancement, pouvoir répondre aux premières demandes et augmenter notre visibilité.

 

Au cours de l’année 2016, nous avons testé Lili smart avec des familles et obtenu des résultats concluants. Notre concept a rencontré un grand succès puisque nous nous sommes vu remettre quatre récompenses :

  • Pitch ta boîte 2016
  • Publicis90
  • Start’up SFR Innovation 2016
  • French IoT, par La Poste

 

Magzup - 14/02/2017 : http://magzup.fr/tag/338

Passeportsante.net - 09/02/2017 : http://www.passeportsante.net/fr/Actualites/Nouvelles/Fiche.aspx?doc=montre-connectee-patients-alzheimer-famille-repas-medicament

Allo-medecins.fr- 09/02/2017 : http://www.allo-medecins.fr/actualite/maladies/09022017,la-medecine-connectee-au-service-des-malades-d8217alzheimer,1282.html

Previssima.fr - 09/02/2017 : http://www.previssima.fr/actualite/perte-dautonomie-et-proche-aidant-emergence-de-solutions-connectees-avec-lili-smart.html

Le Figaro Santé - 07/02/2017 : http://sante.lefigaro.fr/article/les-nouvelles-technologies-au-secours-d-alzheimer

Le Figaro Santé - 06/02/2017 : version papier

Santé sur le net - 07/01/2017 : http://www.sante-sur-le-net.com/lilismart-soutien-connecte-malades/

TheConnectedMag.fr - 22/12/2016 : http://www.theconnectedmag.fr/lili-smart-aidants-alzheimer/

Silvereco.fr - 14/12/2016 : http://www.silvereco.fr/lili-smart-une-solution-connectee-qui-ameliore-la-qualite-de-vie-des-aines-en-perte-dautonomie/3170924

Senioractu.com - 07/12/2016 : http://www.senioractu.com/Lili-Smart-solution-connectee-pour-aider-les-aidants-familiaux_a19570.html

Buzz e-santé.fr - 15/11/2016 : http://buzz-esante.fr/lili-smart/

Agevillage.com - 07/11/2016 : http://www.agevillage.com/actualite-14657-1-un-quipement-innovant-tester-gratuite-RSS.html

Le Progrès - 05/04/2016 : http://www.leprogres.fr/rhone/2016/04/05/lili-smart-veut-se-connecter-a-alzheimer

 

Durant ces deux dernières années, nous avons contacté, rencontré, échangé et travaillé avec de nombreux acteurs intervenants auprès de ces familles :

  • L’équipe du Professeur Pierre Krolak-Salmon, neurologue aux Hospices Civils de Lyon et responsable du Centre de Recherche Clinique Vieillissement-Cerveau-Fragilité, avec qui nous avons initié une étude clinique de notre solution ;

  • Les associations France Alzheimer Drôme et France Alzheimer Rhône ;

  • L’association « Bistrot des aidants » ;

  • La société de services à domicile Adéa Présence ;

  • L’ADAPT (Association pour l’insertion sociale et professionnelle des personnes handicapées) ;

  • Et bien-sûr, les familles elles-mêmes !

Ce travail de co-construction nous a permis d’identifier les difficultés et les besoins principaux des familles afin de concevoir une application qui répond au plus près de leurs besoins.

story:
The Whipper is the world's first and only climbing performance and fitness tracker, that helps you improve your technique and endurance -- using a sleek clip-on device and accompanying Smartphone App.

CLIP & CLIMB

Clip-on the Whipper smart tracker with state of the art motion sensor technology and forget it. The tracker will start working right away by collecting data while you focus on your climbing.

Check your data when you are ready. The device works in real time OR you can log all of your climbs and sync your data after a 3 day Yosemite trip.

The Whipper works indoors and out, so you can use it while at the gym training. You get real time stats such as how long it took you to complete that V5 problem and how many attempts you made.

You can use the Whipper on a multi pitch outdoor climb, simply clip it on and climb. When the day is over you can sync all of your climbing data and check out your stats. For example, you can see a breakdown of how many feet you covered in each pitch on a big wall climb (Pitch 1: 135FT, Pitch 2: 142FT... Pitch 15: 153 FT).

CLIMB & TRACK

While you climb, our tracker is recording your every move.

The Whipper is a smart device that tracks what you climb, where you climb, and how you climb.

All metrics are derived from our proprietary algorithms which incorporate 6 axis motion and a high-speed high-precision altimeter.

Unlike clunky bracelets and watches, the Whipper is clipped at your waist. It is placed near your center of mass resulting in highly accurate measurements.

Automatically calculated metrics such as feet, incline, pace, time and effort are stored in memory on the Whipper device on a per climb and per session basis.

The climbing info is automatically synced to your Smartphone, where it is stored permanently.

The App can record additional information such as the location of your climb using your phone GPS. This information is used to further improve your climbing stats and the accuracy of our climbing algorithms.

While most Whipper features are automatic, you can also opt to manually enter information, such as route name and difficulty level. 

Working on a project indoors? Distinguish discrete climbs within your session overview, compare project attempts, and see how you've progressed! You can record the location of your climb using your phone's GPS. E.g.:

Date: 4/1/2016 4/6/2016
Climb #: 11 3
Name: Piper's Dream Piper's Dream
GPS Location: Whipper Gym - San Francisco Whipper Gym - San Francisco
Grade: 5.11A 5.11A
Feet: 35.4 ft 35.4 ft
Incline: 5 degrees 5 degrees
Falls: 2 falls 0 falls
Calories: 79 cal 55 cal
Pace: 0.0513 ft/sec 0.1475 ft/sec
Time on Wall: 00:10:17 00:04:42
Effort: Shaky Easy and Smooth

Based on all this information the Whipper quickly learns your climbing style and ability.  In this case, the Whipper would recommend that you challenge yourself with a higher grade of slab, now that you've crushed "Piper's Dream".

Get outside, and leave your phone in your pack. After an awesome big wall adventure, check out your expedition summary:

Date: 4/3/2016
Name: Nose
GPS Location: El Capitan - Yosemite
Grade: 5.14A max
Incline: 2 degrees avg
Falls: 2 falls
Calories: 1401 cal
Pace: 0.2413 ft/sec avg
Time on Wall: 23:45:06
Effort: Average

Then you can even check out a session breakdown by pitch!

In this instance, the Whipper quickly learns that you fell twice on the crack pitches. Not only does it recognize this, but it will also recommend antagonist and flexibility exercises for rest days, to help keep you strong and limber.

TRACK & IMPROVE

Our proprietary algorithms detect climbing moves and track stats about your performance so you can improve your climbing technique and endurance.

The Whipper App gives feedback on your skills, technique, and movement so you can track your progress over each session.

TRIPS & SOCIAL

Plan events, weekend trips, or gym meetups:

  • Invite friends to go climbing tomorrow.
  • Plan full trips such as a 3 day Yosemite excursion.
  • Compare your climb with your trad partner.
  • Sync climbing data with your team and compare stats.

SOCIAL & GIVING BACK

We believe in doing good and giving back so:

  • For every 1000 feet climbed outdoors with a Whipper, we will donate $1 to the AccessFund.
  • Our stretch goals include $1K and $5K donations to our favorite charities and non-profits including American Safe Climbing Association (ASCA), AccessFund, and American Alpine Club (AAC).

TECH SPECS

Battery:

-100mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery with 1-2 weeks of battery life

Syncing:

-Automatic data syncing with iOS and Android smartphones using Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology

Sensors:

-Bosch 6-axis motion sensor with accelerometer and gyroscope
-Bosch High accuracy altimeter with thermistor for temperature measurements

Enclosure and Materials:

-Eco-friendly ABS plastic case with silicone outer clip

Memory:

-2 MB of internal storage on the Whipper allows up to 3 days outdoor data and 7 days indoor data (24 hours of continuous climbing time) to be stored before syncing with smartphone

Operating Environment:

-Temperature: -20 °C -- 60 °C
-Up to 35,000 feet in altitude

App:

-Available for free on the Google Play and Apple App store
-Make sure your device is Bluetooth Low energy compliant


TIMELINE

ABOUT

The idea for the Whipper came one afternoon after a climbing session in the scorching 100 degree Sacramento weather. Matt and Laura were talking about their two hobbies, building things and climbing, while walking back to the car. They were also tired of having to write down or memorize the details of their climbing sessions such as which problem they were currently working on and how many routes they climbed in Yosemite last weekend. Eventually, they discussed how amazing it would be if there was a fitness tracker just for rock climbers. That way, they could quantify all of their climbs and optimize their workout sessions. So the Whipper was born!

FAQs

What sensors are on the Whipper?

The Whipper is equipped with a 6-axis motion sensor in addition to an altimeter and temperature sensor.

How does the Whipper measure my climbing performance?

The Whipper’s built-in advanced motion sensors allow it to measure a climber’s stability, effort, and angle of inclination. This data is supplemented with height and temperature measurements using a high accuracy altimeter.

How is the Whipper worn?

The Whipper is worn by clipping the case to your harness or belt. It is extremely easy to put on and remove!

Will the Whipper add a lot of weight to my climbing gear?

The Whipper is lighter than a carabiner! It is almost impossible to feel the difference in weight with and without a Whipper clipped-on.

Does the Whipper sync data to my phone automatically?

Yes, the Whipper will sync data to your phone using Bluetooth whenever it is in range.

Is the Whipper appropriate for outdoor use?

Yes! The Whipper is designed to be used both indoors and outdoors. The silicone outer casing is water, sweat, and shatter resistant, which makes it perfect for outdoor use. 

How does the Whipper give coaching?

The Whipper App analyzes each user’s data on an individual basis and provides feedback based on technical elements during the climb. Using advanced proprietary algorithms, the app translates each of these elements into a climber’s strengths and weaknesses, and offers training suggestions or exercises to improve.

Can I use my iPod Touch with the Whipper? 

Yes you can use your iPod Touch with the Whipper! It works just as well as any smartphone!

Can I use my iPad with the Whipper?

Yes you can use your iPad with the Whipper, although we would recommend a smaller device for more convenience.

What is the battery life?

The Whipper’s battery will last approximately 1-2 weeks under normal usage conditions.

Is the Whipper rechargeable?

Yes, the Whipper comes with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery and can be charged through any micro-USB cable.

What is the Warranty? 

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee your Whipper product to be free of manufacturing defects upon delivery.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk 

Indiegogo allows all backers to cancel or refund their contribution during the live campaign by going to your My Contributions tab of your Indiegogo account. After the campaign is over, any and all requests for refunds will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

How is shipping handled? 

We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service First Class mail. International shipments will be sent via USPS or UPS.

How much is shipping and handling? 

Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost:
FREE in the Domestic United States (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Alaska)
$10 for International Order (anywhere outside the USA)

Will you support a heart rate monitor? 

Yes we plan to support a third party heart rate monitor in a future release. 

Will you support Windows and/or Windows phones? 

We do plan to support Windows if there is enough interest from the community. Please let us know by voicing your opinion via email, Twitter, Facebook or through this campaign!

story:
CLICK HERE TO GO TO THE WEBSITE:   http://kone-x.pro/
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 



In the Summer of 2018, we launched our second successful crowdfunding campaign with the HighHealer. It's the world's first portable 5-in-1 foot care device which allows you to exercise areas of the foot, ankle and calf not only in less time, but more effectively. 

The HighHealer campaign was a big success and we raised over $130k.  The campaign ended in September 2018 with all items shipped between December 2018 and February 2019.

Click here to see the HighHealer IndieGoGo campaign

In July of 2017, we launched our first Kickstarter campaign with the HighBaller. It's the world's first rotating massage balls on a width adjustable stand. HighBaller helps to loosen up stiff, tight muscles. Mainly used for trigger points, it includes a Trigger Point Map, which shows you 30 common trigger points and their referred pain areas. 

The HighBaller campaign was a big success and we raised over $100,000. Within only 3 months after the campaign ended, we had shipped units to all backers. Keeping our backers satisfied and living pain-free is always our top priority.

Click here to see the HighBaller Kickstarter campaign

 

We are excited to launch our 3rd crowdfunding campaign and to make your life more enjoyable! We have successfully delivered our last Crowdfunding campaigns for over 3100 backers.

We have tested several materials and techniques over time to create the product to suit the needs of our customers. We have also received feedback from several professionals and now we can confidently say that we have designed the best possible product for you.

With our network, we can ensure a worldwide delivery of our products. 

We anticipate being able to ship orders in Feb 2020 but if the number of orders exceeds our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill the orders.

More questions?

Please feel free to contact us: hello@activelifeusa.com​

story:
Meet Spring

 

We listened to people with mobility problems and we started our design from scratch. Now we need to fund our first production run of Spring. Back us, and you will bring a better product to someone who deserves it. Help that person go where he or she wants to go.

And if you are the person who will use it, congratulations!
You're one of the first to enjoy Spring.

 

 

Visit our website www.foraydesign.com to see more!

 

The Story of Spring

We have invented a rolling walker that is smart, elegant, and highly functional. We are putting the user back in control of his or her own life.

Our team of talented designers and engineers, committed to helping people maintain and regain an active lifestyle, have moved from prototype to production. Our experts in New York, Hong Kong and mainland China are evaluating our off-tool samples now. We expect to complete our first production run by late summer and ship to customers in November. 

 

Check Out Our Perks

Back us if you, or someone you know, needs a walker. We will ship it later this year. We will confirm delivery instructions before we ship. 

Remember that Spring arrives fully assembled, with clear color-coded instructions so that the person opening the box can use it right away.  The box can be saved for storage in a closet.

Send a Spring to someone you love!

What if you don't need a walker? You can still help us get this revolutionary mobility device into the hands of people who need it.

If you want to support our mission but don't need a Spring, you can donate $25. Each time we receive ten $25 donations, we will donate one Spring Walker to an organization such as Heights and Hills, a Brooklyn NY agency serving community-dwelling older adults. We are also partnering with medical clinics, rehabilitation hospitals, and schools who will be receiving models. Back us multiple times if you want to contribute $50, $100 or more. Your support matters not only to Foray but to institutions who will use them as well.

 

Join Our Leadership Council.

Contribute $1,000 and Receive These Perks:

-an elegant, full-size umbrella with the Foray logo;

-listing on our website and other materials as a member;

-donation of Spring to an individual or institution of your choice.

 

We Salute Our Leadership Council:

John Chatzky * Jill and John Gilbert * James Grant  * Michele Beiny Harkins 

Karen and Paul Isaac * Jessie McClintock Kelly * Pam and Joe McCarthy * Shepley Metcalf 

Anonymous (3)

 

 

 

Product Features

Spring is delivered fully assembled

If you are ordering for someone else, be assured that it will arrive ready to use, with easy-to-follow instructions.

 

    Spring helps your posture            

Your center of gravity is between the front and rear wheels. You stand closer to other people or your kitchen counter.  

 

Continuous handlegrip lets you find your best hand position

Spring is especially designed for people with limitations of hand grip, wrist rotation, or upper arm strength. Find the most comfortable location for each hand and go!

 

Parking brake is activated automatically
when you open the seat 

This is convenient for busy people and a valuable safety feature for the forgetful.

The parking brake can also be activated by hand without opening the seat, useful when a person must have something to lean on without sitting.

 

One motion opens, adjusts the height,
folds and locks the device

This patented technology is at the core of our design. Press the two blue buttons shown in the picture below, and slide the handlebar up or down.

       

 

Watch it open and close

Just depress the two tabs at the edge of the handlegrip; slide the bar down. The wheels come in and the walker locks.

 

Spring’s folded volume is only 30% of its open size

Spring fits right in your car. Take it with you wherever you go.

 
 

 

Reverse brake reduces rollaway risk

Sometimes you have to take your hands off the device for a moment. Spring automatically stops, and will be there after you check your watch, or wave hello to a friend.

   

 

Spring will move with you, and stop when you let go.

 

 

Shock absorbers increase stability, and reduce annoying vibrations to your hands

Take the Spring stability challenge: walk on your sidewalk or driveway with a walker made by any major manufacturer. Then repeat with Spring.  

Spring's technology matters because very few surfaces are completely flat. Our four wheels hug the ground, making Spring less likely to tip or slide.

 

The seat is standard chair height. The handlegrip is lowered with one action to become your seat back

No more awkward transfers from walker to chair, and no need to stow Spring while you eat or work.

 

 
One smooth motion opens and closes the seat. The parking brake is automatically disengaged when you lift up the seat, so you can get up and go, right away.
 

 

All mechanisms are internal

Nothing for you to catch your clothes on—and it doesn’t look “medical.”

 

Storage

Spring has a zipper pocket on the underside of the seat, large enough for a wallet, phone and key ring. We are developing a shopping cart insert which would replace the seat.

 

 

Meet the People Behind Spring

We are a medical doctor, two designers and a marketing expert who care deeply about bringing style and functionality to assistive devices. 

Our company began with a casual conversation over Dr. Patricia's kitchen table. Colin asked her what she found most frustrating about her medical practice. Patricia replied that some people hate walkers so much that they will risk an injury rather than use one. These are health-conscious people who follow medical advice. Maybe the problem was not the person, but the device.

While they talked, Colin sketched a solution which became a precursor to Spring. Hal joined us and we formed Foray Design. In the past year our Marketing Manager, Ioannis Rutledge, has worked to articulate and distribute our message.

 

 

We designed Spring with you in mind. Smart engineering isn’t just about technical execution, it’s about understanding how you live, move and enjoy the world. Rather than taking our cues from an outdated industry, we started from scratch. The result is a beautiful tool, intelligently refined to keep you moving.

 

 

Throughout the process we have had an uncompromising commitment to good design--believing that a highly functional product can also be beautiful and a pleasure to use. 

 

Product Specifications

Maximum user weight: 300 pounds

Spring is most comfortable for people with body-mass index of less than 30

Product weight: 24.2 pounds

 

 

Dimensions

Collapsed:                           26” w x 10” d x 29” h

Opened:                               26” w x 29” d x 33.5” h

Height adjusts from:       33.5-38”

Wheel dimensions:           8” 

Seat dimensions:              12” x 17-1/4”

Seat height from floor:   21”

 

 

Visit our website www.foraydesign.com to see more.

Thank you for your support!

Your support matters not only to Foray but to institutions who will use them as well. Join Our Leadership Council.Contribute $1,000 and Receive These Perks:-an elegant, full-size umbrella with the Foray logo;-listing on our website and other materials as a member;-donation of Spring to an individual or institution of your choice. We Salute Our Leadership Council:John Chatzky * Jill and John Gilbert * James Grant  * Michele Beiny Harkins Karen and Paul Isaac * Jessie McClintock Kelly * Pam and Joe McCarthy * Shepley Metcalf Anonymous (3)   Product FeaturesSpring is delivered fully assembledIf you are ordering for someone else, be assured that it will arrive ready to use, with easy-to-follow instructions.     Spring helps your posture            Your center of gravity is between the front and rear wheels. You stand closer to other people or your kitchen counter.   Continuous handlegrip lets you find your best hand positionSpring is especially designed for people with limitations of hand grip, wrist rotation, or upper arm strength. Find the most comfortable location for each hand and go! Parking brake is activated automaticallywhen you open the seat This is convenient for busy people and a valuable safety feature for the forgetful.The parking brake can also be activated by hand without opening the seat, useful when a person must have something to lean on without sitting. One motion opens, adjusts the height,folds and locks the deviceThis patented technology is at the core of our design. Press the two blue buttons shown in the picture below, and slide the handlebar up or down.        Watch it open and closeJust depress the two tabs at the edge of the handlegrip; slide the bar down. The wheels come in and the walker locks. Spring’s folded volume is only 30% of its open sizeSpring fits right in your car. Take it with you wherever you go.

 
 
 Reverse brake reduces rollaway riskSometimes you have to take your hands off the device for a moment. Spring automatically stops, and will be there after you check your watch, or wave hello to a friend.    Spring will move with you, and stop when you let go.  Shock absorbers increase stability, and reduce annoying vibrations to your handsTake the Spring stability challenge: walk on your sidewalk or driveway with a walker made by any major manufacturer. Then repeat with Spring.  Spring's technology matters because very few surfaces are completely flat. Our four wheels hug the ground, making Spring less likely to tip or slide. The seat is standard chair height. The handlegrip is lowered with one action to become your seat backNo more awkward transfers from walker to chair, and no need to stow Spring while you eat or work.  One smooth motion opens and closes the seat. The parking brake is automatically disengaged when you lift up the seat, so you can get up and go, right away.  All mechanisms are internalNothing for you to catch your clothes on—and it doesn’t look “medical.” StorageSpring has a zipper pocket on the underside of the seat, large enough for a wallet, phone and key ring. We are developing a shopping cart insert which would replace the seat.  Meet the People Behind Spring
We are a medical doctor, two designers and a marketing expert who care deeply about bringing style and functionality to assistive devices. Our company began with a casual conversation over Dr. Patricia's kitchen table. Colin asked her what she found most frustrating about her medical practice. Patricia replied that some people hate walkers so much that they will risk an injury rather than use one. These are health-conscious people who follow medical advice. Maybe the problem was not the person, but the device.While they talked, Colin sketched a solution which became a precursor to Spring. Hal joined us and we formed Foray Design. In the past year our Marketing Manager, Ioannis Rutledge, has worked to articulate and distribute our message.  We designed Spring with you in mind. Smart engineering isn’t just about technical execution, it’s about understanding how you live, move and enjoy the world. Rather than taking our cues from an outdated industry, we started from scratch. The result is a beautiful tool, intelligently refined to keep you moving.  Throughout the process we have had an uncompromising commitment to good design--believing that a highly functional product can also be beautiful and a pleasure to use.  Product SpecificationsMaximum user weight: 300 poundsSpring is most comfortable for people with body-mass index of less than 30Product weight: 24.2 pounds  DimensionsCollapsed:                           26” w x 10” d x 29” hOpened:                               26” w x 29” d x 33.5” hHeight adjusts from:       33.5-38”Wheel dimensions:           8” Seat dimensions:              12” x 17-1/4”Seat height from floor:   21”  Visit our website www.foraydesign.com to see more.Thank you for your support!

story:
Using machine learning algorithms, Actofit tracks your motion in 3D to identify your exercise, count your reps, evaluate your form, measure heart rate and calories burned, all automatically without any user disturbance.

 

When you exercise, your motion is tracked and compared to the database of exercises you record, allowing Actofit to successfully detect your exercise and count the number of reps. Force, Power, Velocity is evaluated on every set and you can see the numbers on your mobile apps along with your exercise log.

 
 

Every exercise has a specific motion signature. Actofit analyses that pattern to identify your exercise automatically. Here are some examples of how we identify each exercise.

Actofit tracks activities to the scale and versatility which has never been done before. This allows for the users to compare and evaluate where they are versus where they want to be, what’s working vs. what's not working and make informed data driven decisions.

 

But don't worry, we still do everything top of the line fitness trackers do!

                

Built by tech and fitness enthusiasts, Actofit is born out of mere need and a real market gap, with the belief that 10k steps is an inaccurate metric to track fitness since not all exercises involve steps, providing Actofit the competitive edge. Actofit starts where most of the market leader wearables stop. Innovative, versatile and comprehensive.

     

 

              

Logging that happened manually, is now automated with data science & logged in mobile apps.

 

              

Every little detail is crunched in ranging from the kind of exercise done to the force, velocity and power during a lift; exercise specific calorie burns to the exercise duration.
 

 
        
 

With every session data logged; compare and evaluate what's working vs. what's not. See where you are against where you want to be. Use this data to make informed decisions; to take your training to new heights.

 

          

Actofit is that unique blend of innovation and versatility, where you can still track steps, sleep, distance, continuous 24 hour heart rate, call/text alerts, calendar notifications apart from your workouts.

 

 

          

Your form is your individual form and may be different than other peoples form. Therefore, we've built an easy to adapt system where our machine learning algorithms adapt to your personal and individual form.

 

Our product is one of a kind and our journey to make this happen began on June 2014. We've come a long way since then, making tremendous dreams and goals happen. Take a look how!

 

 

 

Few snapshots of the manufacturing setups and where the team is currently working to build our pilot batches

Molds Ready for Production

 

                     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The final packaging will be more evolved, but this is how our current packaging looks. We're playing around with different graphic options, we'll keep you updated :)

"Being a fitness enthusiast myself, I was amazed by how the engagement with a fitness tracker made one more aware about his fitness. If tracking steps made so much of a difference, the idea of tracking workouts was simply too intriguing to resist. We wanted to make tracking workouts as simple as tracking steps."  Pratik Saraogi, Cofounder at Actofit, didn't believe 10k steps, as marketed by the market leader wearables, to be an accurate metric to measure fitness, as not all exercises involve steps.

To make this wonderful idea come to fruition, we are now successfully campaigning on Indiegogo, ready to deliver a new generation GYM fitness tracker that focuses on optimising your workout. Allow us to introduce you the very capable Team which includes members from marquee schools such as Indian Institute of Technology, Purdue, Rochester, CoEP and certified fitness trainers, world class engineers, machine learning experts, algorithm developers, data scientists, programmers, designers, production experts.

​

So what are you waiting for? Grab the limited period offer and back the team, the product and the dream of a quality wrist-wear that's innovative, versatile and comprehensive and intends to be a pioneer in tracking, analyzing and improving performance in the strength training space! We cannot thank you enough for your pledge, your support.

story:
Help Us Make Global Impact on Healthcare.

Donate Now and Get:

1) A Unique Stress Reduction & Mindfulness Mobile App. 

Which includes quantitative scientific information on how your stress is effecting your body and simple exercises, reminders and inspirational quotes to help you with daily relaxation and living a true work-life balance.

2) Be the first Beta Testers for our VIRTUAL REALITY Meditations & Wellbeing Workshops. Following the release of our Mobile App, we will be launching a Virtual Reality App for meditations and nurturing well being & relaxation workshops. 

Donate now and be the first Beta Testers and gain VIP Access to our upcoming Virtual Reality series!

See a full list of benefits packages on our Perks page.

Summary

There are very few tools and resources available for people to understand how their thoughts, emotions and lifestyle are effecting their physical condition...and even fewer resources to help them understand what they can do about it. 

Our EPI assessments and TimeWaver Medical Technology enables us to have an in deep look at a person's psycho-emotional-physical interface and put together a personalised program designed for their specific needs.

For the last 5 years, our clinical trials and personalised treatments have focused on London. We've had outstanding and even transformative results on our patients. And now we want to take this out into the world so we can give more people more treatment options as well as more comprehensive and personalised information about their condition.

You can read more about our work at:    orassyultimatehealth.com

What We Hope to Achieve with Your Help: 

We need your help to raise £75,000 so through this campaign we can:

  • Bring together world leading scientists and therapists to contribute health related educational tools and resources for a digital platform that can be easily accessed by the general public. This platform would aim to give people self-assessment information on their condition as well as complimentary treatment options, tools & resources so they can begin to understand how to take their health back into their own hands, whilst waiting in the cue for formal assessments and treatments.

  • Take our comprehensive and personalised treatment options out into the community. The digital platform we build will extend into community based initiatives. We'll be starting in Tower Hamlets by training Nurses, Healthcare professionals and Caregivers to be qualified in "Comprehensive and Personalised Complimentary Medicine". Training Healthcare Professionals in our technology and approach means that they become aware of how a patients thoughts, emotions and lifestyle are effecting their condition, and therefore have the knowledge they need to personalise all treatments.  Our goal is to put patients needs back at the centre of healthcare.
We believe in the importance of patients having a Well Being Experience and therefore see it as critical for more personalised treatment options to be available. We believe it's important for personal challenges/therapies as well as physical improvement/treatments to work hand in hand in order for an individual to achieve their long term goals. 

The Impact

The Problem:

*Clinics and Health Centres are in general overbooked with long waiting lists. The current system puts quantity over quality and as a result people's needs are not met.

*The cost of Healthcare and medication has soared and as a result many people can not afford the treatments they need.  

*Limited Awareness and access to the latest medical technology, research and alternative and complimentary treatments. 

Why "Comprehensive & Personalised Complimentary Medicine"?

It's 'integrative' and 'personalised' because it comprehensively assesses and treats The Whole Person. 

Our model is 100% patient centred. Our integrative approach combines cutting edge science and technology with the latest creative therapies for personalised and comprehensive treatments for patients. This includes

  • In depth non-invasive assessment procedures
  • Sophisticated quantum technologies. Utilising this objective data to empower the patient and have the awareness to better learn from and manage their condition better.
  • Movement therapies, creative therapies and nutrition integrated with bio-informatics. (Helping you understand what your body is trying to tell you and creating a personalised program for your individual physical, mental and emotional needs.) Allowing these creative/movement therapies to express these seemingly intangible phenomena so you can better grasp, manage and cope with your condition and heal from the inside out.

Donate now to change someone's life and have a profound impact on the health of our people and communities.

The Risks & Obstacles:

Pioneering a more personalised and integrative approach to healthcare has challenges. The main obstacle we could face would be getting more healthcare centres and rehabilitation centres to take on this more comprehensive, personalised and integrative approach.

If we don't reach our funding goal we won't be able to: 

-Administer staff training programs or implement our "Comprehensive and Personalised Complimentary Medicine" in Tower Hamlets community. 

But what we do raise will go towards:

*Bringing together world leading scientists and therapists to contribute health related educational tools and resources for the general public.

*Creating a digital platform where the educational tools and resources that we are able to raise funds for can be easily accessed by the general public.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to donate, you can:

*Share this campaign with your friends on facebook or using Indiegogo share tools.

*Email this campaign to your friends and raise awareness on mental health.

*Join our emailing list and learn more about what we do and opportunities for other ways you can be involved.

story:
Food is the one thing we share across all cultures. It is an emotional way to share experiences, delicacies, and memories. Unfortunately, we sometimes neglect it and at other times simply cannot control it –so our foods spoil. That’s why we created the Food Protectors! 


The Food Protectors are silent heroes for every kitchen. They are an organic and safe solution that prevents fruits and vegetables from spoiling at homes!   

Styles

Coming as two attractive designs and with countless colours, the Food Protectors deliver both cuteness and style. Each Protector has a built-in LED light that changes colour over time from green to red, reminding you when to change your powder.

The Original Food Protectors come in red and gold (apple) and white (robot)


A single Food Protector has enormous powers, stopping spoilage in:

 All at once!


Using the Food Protectors is as simple as one, two, three!


Infinitely more efficient, undoubtedly more reliable – this is why you have never seen anything like the Food Protectors.

Each fruit or vegetable spoils for different reasons. Reactions to certain environments, development of fungi, and encounters with bacteria all cause different response from each type of produce, causing them to spoil at rates and moments inconsistent with one another. Over the past 12 years, we have outlined these causes, creating specialize powders that actively target the exact bacteria and fungi that cause spoilage in single fruits or vegetables with incredible precision usually attributed to the top chemical companies. Except we are organic.

Samples of the specialised powders developed throughout the past twelve years.

The beauty of the Food Protectors is the accumulation of all that knowledge into a single, global powder. Our powder is the result of carefully designed combinations of our research, actively targeting the exact causes that lead to spoilage in fruits and vegetables. It successfully focuses on the exact bacterium, fungus, and mushrooms that have negative effects on each and every produce. Thus, we offer a solution that can increase the life of your fruits and vegetables by weeks. This is not you average general solution. It is a calculated attack on the exact components that harm our kitchens. 

The Food Protectors reach incredible levels of effectiveness and precision, which surpass anything available in the market. Real change is coming to your kitchen.

We all suffer from spoilage, so Food Protectors are for everyone! Whether you are:

The Food Protectors are an organic and environmentally friendly solution that stops that stops the global harm caused by food waste, including methane gas, water waste, and land lost.

Save money on food that end up throwing away, and time wasted on going to the supermarket all the time!

The Food Protectors perform magical feats, silently protecting your kitchen from its invisible enemies - bacteria.

Backers' Rewards


We use inexpensive microencapsulated essential oil, such as clove, spearmint, thyme, and more to power the Food Protectors. The powder generated from such a process is slowly released into the air, which creates conditions that safely protect ripeness in fruits and vegetables! 


Essential oils are volatile liquids produced by plants and used by the plant kingdom as natural insecticides, repellants and antimicrobials. They have been known throughout history as effective biopesticides in agriculture, but have been much more expensive than synthetic chemicals as they are volatile and non-stable in air and light, requiring multiple applications. As a result, they have been non competitive to synthetics in developed countries, and too expensive for use in developing countries, until now. By novel inexpensive encapsulation methods with natural materials, and in synergistic combinations with botanical oils, the microencapsulated essential oil products stabilize the essential oils in air and light and have a long term release without phytotoxicity nor do they leave toxic residues per single application, making them a fantastic substitute to synthetic chemical products, and safe for any home application.

*For those who want to know more about the science behind the Food Protectors, refer to the FAQ section, and if there are further interests don't hesitate to contact us, we would love to give a detailed explanation!

 Our powder is therefore green and is a great repellent of insecticides, fungicides, bactericides and nematicides products. It is even edible!



The capabilities of our powder go beyond households. By becoming as effective as chemical preservatives, different combinations of materials can be used for preservation in shipment, storage, and agricultural growth of fruits and vegetables. This can and will continue to reduce food waste in an environmentally friendly way for every sector of the industry. 

Micro encapsulation by itself is an extremely effective tool in a verity of sectors. Its ability to control substances and their release rate has potential all over the consumer world – from flowers to makeup. We already have plans in place to develop an organic preservative for plants, and are looking at possibilities to increase the effectiveness of cosmetics, such as significantly extending the timeframe of the smell of deodorants. 

Food waste is a global concern that affects us all. A growing population means we continue to struggle for food provision, and continual food waste leads to worsening global warming. Every year, food wasted results in the loss of:


The team that leaded us to this moment is composed of countless brilliant minds over the past decade. They have each contributed immensely to every crucial piece of research, ensuring that we remain organic in every step of the way while making constant strides.

Today, the core team that pushes Food Protectors forwards is made of the combination of youth and excitement with experience and ingenuity. Arie Markus is the leading scientist, who invented the technology and has been working on it for over twelve years. He is our Einstein, mentally and physically! Amit Gal-Or is the founder, running both front and backend operations in bringing the Food Protectors to you. Andy Sui runs legal operations and provides strategic planning. WK Chiu is the man behind much of our cool technologies for the container and the packaging.


Risks and Challenges

For the past twelve years, our scientists have created many types of powders for many types of fruits and vegetables. Yet since June, we have been actively working on the Food Protectors’ all-inclusive powder that treats almost all fruits and vegetables.

Over the coming months, we will continue to add more and more fruits and vegetables to the treated list. However, this takes time and testing, as we use active ingredients that target the specific problems in the produce. This is not a risk, but our challenge in continuing to improve our product so that you can rip the benefits. We hope that even before our delivery we can add new fruits and vegetables for the Food Protectors to keep ripe. 

Our main challenge is the movement to large-scale production. We have been working closely with our manufacturer of the containers, and have in place a lab to create the powder. Now we need to put them together and ensure quality control, so that you can have the best possible experience.

From the beginning of the campaign until every product is delivered, we will keep you updated with our progress. We will handle unexpected issues or delays with transparency, and will do our utmost best to answer all your questions and comments.

We are very excited to go through this journey with you, and bring you all a Protector to your kitchen.

By novel inexpensive encapsulation methods with natural materials, and in synergistic combinations with botanical oils, the microencapsulated essential oil products stabilize the essential oils in air and light and have a long term release without phytotoxicity nor do they leave toxic residues per single application, making them a fantastic substitute to synthetic chemical products, and safe for any home application.*For those who want to know more about the science behind the Food Protectors, refer to the FAQ section, and if there are further interests don't hesitate to contact us, we would love to give a detailed explanation! Our powder is therefore green and is a great repellent of insecticides, fungicides, bactericides and nematicides products. It is even edible!The capabilities of our powder go beyond households. By becoming as effective as chemical preservatives, different combinations of materials can be used for preservation in shipment, storage, and agricultural growth of fruits and vegetables. This can and will continue to reduce food waste in an environmentally friendly way for every sector of the industry. Micro encapsulation by itself is an extremely effective tool in a verity of sectors. Its ability to control substances and their release rate has potential all over the consumer world – from flowers to makeup. We already have plans in place to develop an organic preservative for plants, and are looking at possibilities to increase the effectiveness of cosmetics, such as significantly extending the timeframe of the smell of deodorants. Food waste is a global concern that affects us all. A growing population means we continue to struggle for food provision, and continual food waste leads to worsening global warming. Every year, food wasted results in the loss of:The team that leaded us to this moment is composed of countless brilliant minds over the past decade. They have each contributed immensely to every crucial piece of research, ensuring that we remain organic in every step of the way while making constant strides.Today, the core team that pushes Food Protectors forwards is made of the combination of youth and excitement with experience and ingenuity. Arie Markus is the leading scientist, who invented the technology and has been working on it for over twelve years. He is our Einstein, mentally and physically! Amit Gal-Or is the founder, running both front and backend operations in bringing the Food Protectors to you. Andy Sui runs legal operations and provides strategic planning. WK Chiu is the man behind much of our cool technologies for the container and the packaging.Risks and ChallengesFor the past twelve years, our scientists have created many types of powders for many types of fruits and vegetables. Yet since June, we have been actively working on the Food Protectors’ all-inclusive powder that treats almost all fruits and vegetables.Over the coming months, we will continue to add more and more fruits and vegetables to the treated list. However, this takes time and testing, as we use active ingredients that target the specific problems in the produce. This is not a risk, but our challenge in continuing to improve our product so that you can rip the benefits. We hope that even before our delivery we can add new fruits and vegetables for the Food Protectors to keep ripe. Our main challenge is the movement to large-scale production. We have been working closely with our manufacturer of the containers, and have in place a lab to create the powder. Now we need to put them together and ensure quality control, so that you can have the best possible experience.From the beginning of the campaign until every product is delivered, we will keep you updated with our progress. We will handle unexpected issues or delays with transparency, and will do our utmost best to answer all your questions and comments.We are very excited to go through this journey with you, and bring you all a Protector to your kitchen.

story:
We've started Ellie's campaign for a second round!!!

we were so happy that our first round raised a little over $1200 and its lovely to know that this amount of money sits safely in Ellie's bank account in trust. We are going for a second round in order to continue to add to Ellie's account. Ellie has so many needs that are constantly changing as she grows. Portable oxygen concentrator, portable feeding pump, and many many other medical supplies that are not covered by the ministry of health. We will continue to fund raise for a number of reasons... To secure a home, to provide Ellie with whatever equipment she needs to improve her quality of life, To hopefully be able to take her out of country to see an ILD specialist, and our ultimate goal.. to also be able to help other families!! I hope that our community, the people in your community and possibly even people worldwide can join together and realize the value and reward that comes with improving the lives of little children that struggle daily for that very thing.... To live!

 

SAVE ELLIE'S HOME 

Hi, I am Ellie's mommy and to be quite honest I am very unsure about what to say or write here. But I am a mom and as a mom, I will do whatever it takes to help my baby.My beautiful Ellie was born dec. 22,2010. The absolute best Christmas present any person could ask for. She is perfect and a complete joy. Her smile is contagious and absolutely lights up the room. Ellie appeared to be perfectly healthy until she was about 8 weeks old. At her well baby check up we were rushed to hospital for an evaluation to determine why she seemed to be having laboured breathing... She had a few small tests done and was referred to cardiology and respirology. we didn't realize that Ellies little body was too stressed to even wait for those referrals and before she could get in to see any specialists Ellie was admitted her first time. She was quite sick, our pastor came in and we were asked if we would like to have Ellie baptized. I couldn't do it! I felt that baptizing her meant I was giving up on Ellie, that I felt she was not strong enough to fight this! Whatever "this" was! Ellie was in hospital 2 weeks, and underwent dozens of tests with, of course no answers. We should have been home, enjoying those precious first weeks of her life. Her big sister Avery who was only 2, could not understand why suddenly mommy was gone and the peaceful days after Ellie's birth had suddenly become tearful, stressful worried days. Ellie finally was discharged and once home, we thought we could get back to just living. We were an average family, we loved our church, we volunteered at the homeless shelter serving meals, loved being involved in our community and helping whenever we knew of people who needed Help. We are actually quite a large family. Ellie is blessed to have 7 other siblings! She is the baby! We have taught our older children to love all people and be involved in their community.It was not long, in fact it was within 3 weeks and Ellie was being rushed back to our children's hospital by ambulance. This time in extreme respiratory distress and vomiting on herself and loosing consciousness. This time we were admitted for a longer time as doctors struggled to figure out what on earth was wrong with her. Cystic fibrosis was the number one suspect but the tests all came back negative. 

Ultimately after several tests it was determined that Ellie must have, childhood interstitial lung disease. This is very rare and finding the sub type would require biopsies of her lungs.Several emergency visits, admissions and scares later. Ellie was admitted for her biopsy which found that she has perhaps the rarest form of ILD. There are 19 people worldwide with her subtype. Ellie was number 18 to be diagnosed with folicular bronchiolitis And NEHI cells.

She lives her life tethered to oxygen tubing and with a feeding tube. She is on a ventilator for all sleeps in an effort to preserve her lungs so we can potentially hold off a lung transplant. Ellie's future is uncertain, she loves life even though several times a day she throws up from her laboured breathing, or she has episodes in which she stops breathing and looses counsciousness. In fact, this has become her normal. No 22 month old baby should know this as there normal. It breaks my heart as her mom. We are a close family but do not have the support of family as most people do, except for my brother and wonderful sister in law. Ellie and Avery don't have the blessing of being loved on by grandparents. We have always worked hard to provide for our children ourselves. I struggled and put myself through school to become a paramedic, this was my dream and with Ellie's health, I am not able to go back tO work. I am her nurse, her primary caregiver and I am her mommy. I wouldn't leave this babies side now, not for any amount of money. Not to mention, we are not in a position to hire a nurse to care for her in order for me to work. it would be financially impossible. My husband is a ceramic tile installer. His job counts on him being there. If Ellie is sick, he looses contracts. Income is very limited to begin with, a lost contract is devestating on top of the heartache of watching our baby fight for her life.

ellie has had an episode in ICU, admitted and on life support with no explanation for why she could not breathe on her own. We were simply told, it can happen at any time and we never know which of these episodes would be the one that she does not come out of.

because of her immuno compromised status and poor lung function our home is our safe place! Our home is all we have and it is where we spend ALL of our time. Loosing the luxury of staying here is devestating. We live isolated from friends and the little family we have as nobody can be here if they have even so much as a sniffle. This applies even if they have been around someone else who is sick. It means Christmas, thanksgiving, birthday celebrations are moray often spent by ourselves.

one thing I have learnt with Ellie and her health is to truly not take life for granted or any of our abilities. And I've learnt perspective is so important in life. Do I think my Ellie suffers more than a child with cancer or EB or the multitudes of diseases I've encountered due to having my own chronically ill child, NO I don't but this is MY baby and I need to do everything in my power to make her life stable. I just feel this is not even in my control now.we are just not "takers", we are a family that gives back and any blessings that come to us will certainly not be in vain.

THE GOAL...

Ive been asked what the actual goal is... Our hearts desire is to buy this house. That being said, we know that's a huge "wish" and this may be impossible.  We hope that the funds raised will allow this to happen and that the campaign will "get noticed" allowing us to help other families also. If there are not enough funds to secure this home, maybe another will come up but our hopes are that we can actually buy something and not have to move Ellie. 

If the funds raised to not allow for any of these goals, they will be put into Ellie's account in trust. we also planned that IF the house could be purchased, it would also be for Ellie.I'm not sure of the legalities etc. but we would want to secure it as Ellie's home.

 

Ellies Story:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NrqmDDV-Rcg&list=PL339797CDB523DDD3&index=3&feature=plpp_video

 

Ellies Facebook Love Page:

http://www.facebook.com/#!/groups/119157344864332/

story:
My name is Jamil Crews. I'm reaching out to all of you guys for a cause that is near and dear to me, The Shannon Smith Medical Benefit. Shannon Smith, the 29 year old native of Buffalo New York, has a very unique story. While living in Las Vegas and pregnant with her second child, she went to the hospital because of pneumonia complications. Her condition worsened, and she eventually developed a near fatal blood disease called sepsis, but her case was one of the worst cases anyone had ever seen. 

Shannon not only lost her child, but the sepsis was so severe that in order to survive, she had to have all of her limbs amputated. So Shannon became a rare quadruple amputee case in this country. She eventually moved back to Buffalo from Las Vegas, and her mom took an early retirement to care for her daughter. Shannon is courageously fighting to live a normal life, but that wouldn't come without setbacks,  one being the MASSIVE medical expenses she incurred. While in the hospital Shannon incurred over ONE MILLION DOLLARS in medical expenses. Another setback she has is her home not having handicap accessibility. It is becoming burdensome for her family to carry her up and down several flights of stairs each day. 

My organization, Capital Change, decided this was certainly a cause to get behind. This is particularly dear to me, as Shannon and I were very close friends when we were growing up, going through high school. We went our separate paths, but divine intervention allowed us to cross paths again, and God placed it in my heart to do something for Shannon. That's why, through my organization, I have come up with a goal to raise $10,000 for Shannon by December 1, 2012 to help cover her medical expenses and to purchase a handicap accessibility ramp for her to get up and down the stairs in her home. We will be presenting the check to Shannon at our 30 Under 30 Awards Gala which is taking place December 1, 2012. 

Shannon is making an INCREDIBLE comeback. Doctor's are still working on getting Shannon fully functional prosthetics and she continuing her fight each day with a beautiful smile on her face. Help me make Shannon's comeback story a reality by donating today!

story:
Fundraiser for Oumar Cisse, known as Peace Corps Baba

Help us raise funds for Baba’s urgently needed surgery, scheduled for November 12 in France.

Our dear friend, Oumar Cisse, known to most of the world as Peace Corps Baba, needs our help.  Baba makes his living as an art merchant, living in Mopti, Mali.  He is an ambassador for Mail, traveling to neighboring countries, the US and Europe, selling ethnic jewelry and textiles of the many artisans of his country, and in the process supports hundreds of fellow Malians and their families. Baba’s life’s work has always been more than selling jewelry, beads and textiles. It is about serving people – uplifting, mentoring, inspiring, providing opportunity to the people of his area of the world. He is the selfless friend to the young and old who work with him, his neighbors,  to travelers who never forget him, to fellow exporters and importers. He is a legend throughout West Africa and a mention of him elicits immediate respect. There is no wonder why the Peace Corps honored him with his title of Peace Corps Baba.

Peace Corps Baba never asks for anything in return for all that he does. But now, he needs help. A couple weeks ago he was diagnosed liver cancer requiring medical attention immediately.  His surgery, which will be done in France, has been delayed until 55,000 Euro can be raised.  Recovery and treatment for this will be costly as well.  The need for this funding is very urgent!

Please join those of us who know and love him by donating what you can.  In addition to your contributions, we need you to pass this request on to people in your network, your face book friends, your blogs and tweets.  Many small donations will make it so we can reach or exceed our goal of raising $10k by October 24.

As a young man he worked as a language instructor to new Mali Peace Corps volunteers, and was encouraged by them to build a business out of the beaded jewelry he created. Over the past 30 years he has returned the benefits he received from PCV several hundred fold.  His selfless existence is in service of his people, his West African country, and the friends he has made from around the world.  He makes sure hundreds of Malian artisans have work and that Malian exports are known for their traditional origins and quality.  He is a peacemaker - the one that people come to solve property, family, and neighborhood disputes.  People line up in the evening outside of his home to talk to him asking for money for food for their families and opportunity to succeed – no one leaves without his encouragement and enough food or money to feed their family for the next day.

Peace Corps Baba is in love with life and gives of himself every waking hour. He is devoted to his family, a loyal friend, a national treasure and a model for what is right in the world.  At a time when Mali is experiencing devastating infrastructure deterioration, he cannot look to his neighbors and friends at home to help.  This man is most deserving. With many people providing a donation, we can put a significant dent in the expenses he is accruing to stabilize his health and continue to be the important person he is in the world.

 “Show your support for a great man, contribute TODAY and make TOMORROW a better world for one man, his family, our tribe, two nations, ONE WORLD!”  SS
